I still make comments to my family about how please I am with this camera...and that's saying a lot considering how many digital cameras we've had and how many hours I've poured into researching them.  This camera has a ton of fun options (I love the Illustration option) and it's super easy to use.  I wanted a great camera for point & shoot pictures - I've found it!  No more mourning over blurry pictures!

Reviews.Title: Easy camera to use
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: This is nice and small and easy to use.  It takes great pictures and easily uploads to your computer.  If you're looking for a compact camera that takes good pictures and is simple to use, this is a great choice.

Reviews.Title: K.I.S.S. - keep it simple sweetie
Reviews.Author: P. Wilson
Reviews.Content: I bought it, I like or it works for me or the recipient of the item or it makes the college students in the family happy.  Nothing profound or lyrical – whatever I bought, it does what I want it to do.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Raj Singh
Reviews.Content: item well built, looks very attractive, it the envy of others...love the product... I am very just happy with the appearance oft this item...

Reviews.Title: Love this camera.
Reviews.Author: Lilly Y. "me"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. I used to have Canon one with faster processor,, but i always found that Sony makes MUCH BETTER pictures. Sometimes i feel its a bit slow going from shooting a picture to another shooting, but it has tons of features.One thing i owuld love to see improved is the continuos shooting - the feature does not use flash light, and the other single shooting with delay - 2, 10 sec does only one image per time, i would love to see at least 3 on that mode.Also the video file extension is a bit strange to me, but fortunately it does have some options to choose from.Small and compact, it never leaves my purse.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture and Movies
Reviews.Author: Hill (jmhill@ptd . net)
Reviews.Content: Need a camera to go on vacation and this camera fit well into my pocket.  I didn't even feel it but it was there when I needed it.  I would recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Love my Sony!
Reviews.Author: AZScout
Reviews.Content: I like it!  It's great for the price.  Takes fantastic photos!  Used it on a recent vacation and was not disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Compact & Sleek Sony Camera
Reviews.Author: shailesh mane
Reviews.Content: This model is extremly easy to use. With good features. Has a USB interface to connect to my laptop.Nice small and sleek model.I like it.

Reviews.Title: Not as fast
Reviews.Author: ORLANDO RAMIREZ E "Orlando"
Reviews.Content: Not as fast as I would have liked.  The pictures are acceptable and with appropriate light, you might be able of getting very good ones.  Under low light there are real problems on making acceptable pictures.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what we needed
Reviews.Author: Laurie
Reviews.Content: I wanted a simple camera that would allow me to take close up pictures of my cute kids. I also wanted to take video clips of them. This is perfect for us. I love the zoom. I am also able to zoom and crop the pictures, and take out red eye, through editing features on the camera. I like things simple, and this has made my life more simple. I am getting better pictures of my kids with my limited photographic abilities.  I love how quickly it turns on too.

Reviews.Title: one of the best camera's
Reviews.Author: Devon white
Reviews.Content: First let me say that this camera is one of the best point and shoot camera's on the market. As far as durability megapixles, and zoom and Image stabalization. Also the sleeknes of the camera is very appealing slim nice size lcd screen fast shuttter speed. I bought this camera at Target and got it on clearance for $54.95 brand new never opended i saw it the one day looked it up and saw it sells for $300 dollars. so i got an amazing deal,.

Reviews.Title: Sony
Reviews.Author: fretfulfred
Reviews.Content: The thing I really like about this camera is its video capabilities. Very small but takes great video. Spy cam.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Chestnut Collision & Restoration
Reviews.Content: This camera is exactly as explained.  It takes great photos, and with an upgraded card, great HD videos with exceptional clarity too.  It is also very compact and light weight.  I would definitely recommend this camera to anyone in the market.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: Valerie Baker
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with this camera - still have a lot to learn about it but very happy we bought it.

Reviews.Title: Meh
Reviews.Author: Amanda Stanford
Reviews.Content: The camera started out great. Very fast shutter speed and took clear pictures. However, as time goes on it is becoming worse. It is nearly impossible to take good pictures at night. Also, the processing time between when you take a picture and when you can take the next one starts to increase the longer the battery has been active.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Dr. Armand B M
Reviews.Content: As usual with sony products a very reliable product good quality on its purpose. Higly recommendable for every one seeking a camera.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: SK
Reviews.Content: Its not the best but its good for the low price range. Overall picture quality is good. However low light pictures are not at par.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Carlos Mejia
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great photos and the zoom is pretty good! The controls are easy for me to go through without it asking 5 minutes to change something.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: Good Camera, Slick looking , Small and convienent. This would be a great camera for anyone that wants to have one on hand.

Reviews.Title: Easy-to-use camera with great focus
Reviews.Author: Ellie wetzel
Reviews.Content: I am not the most tech-savvy person, but I love this camera! It is easy to use and produces great pictures.  I no longer have to worry about pictures being blurry or out of focus.  There may not be a lot of bells and whistles on this camera, but for my needs, it is exactly what I need at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: LoriLynn
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect little camera.  It takes great shots and it fits into your purse.  I used it just a few nights ago at my nephew's chorus event and was able to shoot video and the 10X zoom was very helpful.  I am still discoverying the extra features and will be taking this on our family vacation this August and hope to get some great candids at my brother's wedding in August.

Reviews.Title: great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Michael Mazur
Reviews.Content: It is small and fast camera, great photo and superb video quality. The video stabilization works great, you can walk while recording video and the result will surprise you. I've bought it for my sister and used it for two weeks in my US travel.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: My Mind Works 247
Reviews.Content: I love the results of the video this camera does. Excellent quality in it's sound recording. I also love the zoom quality. Its got an easy to read in the camera user guide which is very helpful to find what all this camera can do. I am loving it.  Great for someone who wants to just point and shoot, no muss, no fuss- and get great quality photos. So far every time I transfer the pics to my PC and see the photos enlarged, I just keep saying Wow, Wow, Wow, that's how good it is.

Reviews.Title: Petite and Smart
Reviews.Author: JP
Reviews.Content: The telescopic lens is fantastic. I can compare some images with my DSLR. I love this piece, fits into your back pocket with crystal clear clarity.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX150 18.2 Exmor R CMOS Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Michael Horstmeyer
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful point and shot camera. There has been some absolutely thorough reviews posted and that is how I made a decision to buy this camera. The camera is small and I always use the wrist strap. One other note is that if this is your 1st. camera be advised that Sony has to be the worst company in the world for their Manuals. I had a Sony about 5 years (my 1st.) ago and almost sent it back, because I knew nothing and didn't know what the icons meant. I bought this point and shot because of reviews and I have used other camera's since. This camera is wonderful for those spontaneous shots and videos. One final thought is I have found that for me: I shot all my videos with the Movie Quality set to HQ standard image (1440x1080(60i) setting. The reason is that this setting views great, but more importantly, you will find it to be much more Forgiving to Sudden Movement than the higher settings and uses less storage. Happy camera shooting and give all the settings a try.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Hermann Luis Lebkuchen
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing!The quality of software and hardware is soo great!!The purchase works fine and I'm very exciting with this product!

Reviews.Title: Nice shots!
Reviews.Author: Simsy
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to bring on vacation. The small size was perfect, and it took great pictures. I never got a chance before I left to read all of the instructions, but The automatic setting worked fine for me. The Rechargeable battery was a huge plus for me and the power lasted almost all day with lots of use.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera for a Great Price!
Reviews.Author: Taba
Reviews.Content: I have this camera for a few months now and the pictures it takes are just stunning and  beautiful. Totally worth the price. This camera is, by far, the best one I've ever had.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Bjovinson
Reviews.Content: I have a Nikon full size camera that I love but was looking for something small to carry on the go.  This fits the bill perfectly.  Easy to use, compact, great picture quality....nice price!

Reviews.Title: great quality
Reviews.Author: Charlie
Reviews.Content: I love sony cameras and this one was no exception. Great picture quality and easy to use. Perfect compact camera!

Reviews.Title: Perfect camera
Reviews.Author: Nichole
Reviews.Content: I ordered this after looking at the same item from other places/catalogs, and reading all reviews. Not only was it a great price, it came fast and everything was as promised. Now, I am just having fun trying all the effects and adjusting the scenes. Once I get complete feel for it, I know I'll be even happier. Thanx! :)

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: Great camera, camera came from Flash Focus, packed poorly in big loose box, very little packing materials. Camera took excellent pictures and videos in Las Vegas.

Reviews.Title: excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Amir A.
Reviews.Content: excellent cameraamazing videos, ultra light and compact, very responsive, good auto focus both on photos and especially on video

Reviews.Title: excellent product!
Reviews.Author: hastidias
Reviews.Content: I recommend it. It is exactly as published. I arrive at the stipulated time. Good product. Greetings from Mérida - Venezuela

Reviews.Title: so far I looovveee it
Reviews.Author: mcmegan
Reviews.Content: from the many, many reviews I read about a point and shoot camera, I knew this was the one I wanted.  I was nervous about getting a 'used' one that clamined to have cosmetic damage.  I have yet to find where the damage it.  I love the camera.  The pictures it takes are superior to any point and shoot camera I have seen under 300 dollars.  I've only had it about 2 weeks, but so far so good.

Reviews.Title: Perfection with a click
Reviews.Author: Moria
Reviews.Content: I ordered this Sony Cyber -shot to take my birthday pics, It did the job, the pics comes out light and very bright at first, but when i upload them to my laptop the pics were flawless.. The size of the camera is small and lightweight..

Reviews.Title: Slow Processing
Reviews.Author: Sports Nut "sports nut"
Reviews.Content: The camera takes good pictures and has a fast shutter.  I returned this item because the camera processing/writing to disk takes at least 3 seconds.  This was in all modes that I used.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: singalongsongs
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for an a outstanding affordable camera, this is it.  Easy to work, amazing picture, even with the simplest setting takes awesome pictures.  I am in love with this little camera.

Reviews.Title: A blast to use
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Singleton
Reviews.Content: This was money well spent as it encourages my 10 year old to constantly take pictures/videos. Well worth the money spent.

Reviews.Title: Camera is good but the quality of the product was not
Reviews.Author: Pascal Hildebrand
Reviews.Content: The camera was good in general, I tried some pictures in general, but then I recognized some quality issues such as the button to access the pictures was not functioning properly.. Back to Amazon - I'll wait for a new try and offer!

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Marks
Reviews.Content: This camera has everything you could really want for the price.  Not SLR quality, but then, it's not $700.  Would recommend to an entry-level photog like myself.

Reviews.Title: its a cool camera
Reviews.Author: Sijo J. Thomas "geek"
Reviews.Content: i love this one..great pictures....great video...you can refocus when using video and goes inside your pocket...definitely recommend to all

Reviews.Title: Fast, accurate focus even up close
Reviews.Author: Artur Grabowski
Reviews.Content: I like the camera in general. Picture quality is good, video is good enough. What I love about the camera is how well it focuses up close. Coming from an older Canon compact this thing can capture anything.Only grips is with some of the on-board picture post-processing. For example, there is a "background out of focus" mode that simply blurs whatever is not in focus. This works well sometimes but you can often tell that it's an analog depth of field effect.

Reviews.Title: Missing Element
Reviews.Author: M. GLARDON
Reviews.Content: I am learning the camera. Meanwhile, imagine my surprise that this camera was sold WITHOUT a memory card.  put a battery in and thought it was set. All my prior Sony cameras came with a card. I was out of town covering a Fashion Show and discovered too late it did not have a memory card in it! I have lost the opportunity of the runway shots forever!

Reviews.Title: Such a good camara!
Reviews.Author: PAMELA LAGUNA
Reviews.Content: I recommend this product so much! this is such a great camara, small size, light weight, so good in megapixels and also a very good zoom, is the perfect pocket size having a very good perfomance!

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX150
Reviews.Author: David Hanson
Reviews.Content: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX150sadly disappointed in this camera. Has a long recovery time between pictures..........was expecting a very quick turn around when I read the descriptionvideo software has to be download, then only works with windows. That was not in the description.....not like the Sony's used to be.....Save your money, was not worth the savings deal I found and try something elseI wish I had ....

Reviews.Title: Little Powerhouse of a Camera
Reviews.Author: Rod Ismay
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these cameras, the Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX150 about a month ago and loved it.  I accidentally left it in a taxi and have not yet gotten it back and possibly may not.  Anyway I am buying another one a little cheaper, but this is a dynamite little camera.  It is a little smaller than a cigarette pack.  It has 10X power zoom, which is quite a lot.  You can zoom in on things far away.  Most of the back of the camera is a screen with the picture on it.  So you see instantly what you have and whether you need to take another.  The flash is enough to lighten my living room which is not large.  The fact that it is 18 mega pixels is amazing.  That is a large image.  This is being sold at cheaper prices now than before and I recommend that you pick up one for yourself and one as a spare or gift.  This is a good, no, GREAT camera for the price.  Got this at Amazon.com.

Reviews.Title: it's good for me
Reviews.Author: Gordon C Jackson
Reviews.Content: I'm an amateur with camera mechanical details (shutter speed, F-stop, ISO exposure, etc.) but can still speak for the end results. I've had this for about 3 months now and I like what I see.  Wow, what a noticeable improvement over my previous 5 year old point-and-shoot digital.  While I haven't gone deep into the menu for custom settings, I have experimented with various conditions: strong back light, low light, etc in the fully automatic setting most all to my pleasure.  It really leaves the composition of the shot my prime concern and takes care of the rest.  That's just what I wanted.  So, at well under $200, It was recommended to me and I now recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: I am highly satisfied!!!
Reviews.Author: Michael Levitt
Reviews.Content: This item was delivered on time and it is as described by seller.  I read lots of customer and professional reviews, and I have to say this camera so far has even exceeded the glowing reviews.  It is a very small camera that at first felt awkward to me, but now I love the size as it can fit into my pants pocket or even a shirt pocket.  The photos are crisp and clear.  The 10x telephoto works great as the automatic stabilization system helps minimize blurring from hand movement.  I bought extra chargeable batteries and an external battery charger that I haven't used yet because the battery that came with the camera holds its charge well.So all I can say is this camera is a winner!  Get one soon...

Reviews.Title: My best P&S; cam
Reviews.Author: Antonio Pacpaco
Reviews.Content: So far this Sony product is my favorite point and shoot digital camera.  It has a slick, small body that can do miracle shots for leisure photographers like me.  The shutter speed is very fast, low lighting issues are almost non-issues.  Love it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: J Hackman
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a good low-light camera to take shots of my Grandaughter playing volleyball as you can't use a flash during matches. It works just wonderfully! Just a great all around camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca
Reviews.Content: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX150 18.2 MP Exmor R CMOS Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom and 3.0-inch LCD (BlUE) (2012 Model)Pro's:1. Great Camera... Love the zoom, it's awesome and it works...2. I referred 2 friends to this camera after my purchase of this camera and all of us think the same for the use, picture quality as well as the HD video for this camera.3. I purchased the Blue one and the color is an awesome Blue / both my friends love the Black color they purchased.4. The zoom is great, you have to be steady and it takes great pictures when zoomed out.5. The Macro - O Man this is great from our last Sony as you can use the Macro without selecting the Macro button, its "Auto Macro" so you subject don't get away faster than you can select the Macro button and make sure your on Macro! Love it! Sony makes an awesome camera both for functionality, looks, design and sleekness.6. From my previous camera and yes all three of us had the previous Sony and it don't compare to the Video in this new camera  - this one has great picture quality for the movies.7. Seller shipped as promised and SUPER shipping rate! Received package intact as described by seller with no missing parts...Con's:1. I was a bit taken back as to the quality of this camera. I'm used to Sony having a wee bit more weight for their product. This one appears to be of another metal or plastic where-as all my other Sony Cameras were of real quality metal and it showed it! I guess it's expected when things are moving at the speed they are today and the rate of planned obsolescence of a product being less than a year it's a wonder they're not made of paper for automatic degradation!All in All -  Pleased with out purchase

Reviews.Title: tomalira@gmail.com
Reviews.Author: Tomas Gomez
Reviews.Content: excellent product congratulations and tested and it has high definition that I had not imagined I will show to others

Reviews.Title: Memories Software is "pitiful"
Reviews.Author: Dr Ronald R Hei
Reviews.Content: This camera takes "decent" pictures but not worth the money.  Having to use their Memories Software is absolutely awful.  The camera has a USB interface, why not let it work directly with Windows Explorer?  Would/will not purchase another Sony.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera !!
Reviews.Author: pajtim
Reviews.Content: Excellent Camera- Zoom, Clarity, Handy & good for low light photography.This camera was really a good deal,I bought it for just 159 dollars and it is very good quality.The video is great.It does take nice pics.I'm happy with camera,it's so nice.

Reviews.Title: Sweet little camera
Reviews.Author: eco-mom
Reviews.Content: We gave this camera as a gift to friends who didn't have a pocket-size camera.  So far they love it!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Megs
Reviews.Content: So glad to have this camera. Lovely and easy to use. The addition of the panoramic pictures adds a fun touch to the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: JRose
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. Especially for anyone that likes special effects and playing around with their photos or videos. It takes great pictures on its auto setting. What I really love about it is its many modes and special effects. I shot a video using the feature that only records one color, for example red, and everything in the video was black and white except for a plant I had that had red flowers .I also recorded a video outside which only shot things in blue, which of course included a beautiful blue sky while everything else was black and white. (except of course if there was a blue object in the video, then that would be recorded in blue too).Very easy to use, easy to understand and the menu buttons are very accessible.

Reviews.Title: Super camara
Reviews.Author: Paul S.
Reviews.Content: Very clear, many features , excellent. The camara is thin , you can store it in you pocket very easily, not bulky

Reviews.Title: Well Pleased
Reviews.Author: Annie
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera to go on vacation as something light. All the features are great. Sometimes it gets difficult to get to all of them. Make sure you read the manual prior to using if you want to get the most out of your picture taking. Great little camera though.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera but almost too small!
Reviews.Author: Paul H. Bischofs
Reviews.Content: This camera does a whole lot but it can be a little overwhelming to learn.  Still it takes awesome photos.

Reviews.Title: Super easy camera with great results
Reviews.Author: Tessa
Reviews.Content: This compact camera is amazing!  Took it on a roadtrip and took many pictures through the windshield or side window driving down the road at 65 mph or better.  The pictures look great and we couldn't be happier with the camera.  Plus the zoom feature is really super.  No complaints!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: I had to replace my Casio EXilim 7 digital camera after a few years. I really liked that camera, but the stabilizer went on it and I thought I would just try this Sony Cyber-shot. I have a couple of other Sony products and like them. This camera has a lot of good features and takes nice photos easily. I have not yet had a chance to give it a thorough work out, but what I have seen so far is good. I do think it is a lot more "plasticky" than my old Casio, which makes me think it may not be long-term durable. Fingers crossed. That is the only reason I have given it 4 stars rather than 5 because everything contained in the camera and how fast and secure I received it is great.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Daniele Garofalo
Reviews.Content: great little camera for the photo enthusiast. So many different settings to play with. Only problem i have is the battery life is very short. Easy fix with the purchase of a second battery.

Reviews.Title: Good not great!
Reviews.Author: Lance
Reviews.Content: Good pics but it is really small almost awkward to take pictures. If you have bigger hands this is not the camera for you.

Reviews.Title: Takes great photos, nice videos
Reviews.Author: Griff
Reviews.Content: We're very happy with this camera.  It is the second Sony we've had now and it serves us well.  I love the panorama picture feature.As others have noted, the camera is very light.  Once you get used to it, it's no problem.Very happy with the purchase!

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Jeanne
Reviews.Content: It was purchased as a baby shower gift and it is exactly what they wanted and works beautifully. They will enjoy many memories with it and the pictures are perfect.

Reviews.Title: Impressed
Reviews.Author: Ronald Cardenas
Reviews.Content: First of all, delivery was great it came in perfect conditions. In action the camera does its job zooming is awesome optical and digita. Low light pictures are ok. It's a good point and shoot camera worth its price.

Reviews.Title: In Sony style
Reviews.Author: Diane Carlson
Reviews.Content: What can you say? 18.2 MP--clear, life like photos.  An upgrade from my 10MP. 10X zoom, over all camera smaller, but same easy to use menu.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Janice
Reviews.Content: Easy to useTakes great picturesUsed it at P!nk concert, tele lens worked great. Got some very nice pic's

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: jjtucker
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera and I am extremely delighted with its functions and quality of pictures.The pictures are sharp, clear and beautiful color.  Very pleased with all aspects of thistransaction and the versatility of the camera.

Reviews.Title: MODERN
Reviews.Author: anitarivas24
Reviews.Content: simply fantastic. excellent presentation, I had my doubts when buying online. but I made a good choice, very easy to use, practical, modern and excellent travel companion. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: Bought for my vacation in China
Reviews.Author: Julio E. Castillo
Reviews.Content: Had to send for repair after ther trip. A black spot came in most of the pictures.Guarantee was no problem, left it at the store and after ten days I received it back well repaired.Price however had dropped substantially after only 5 weeks.Pictures I took were outstanding.

Reviews.Title: DSLR Killer
Reviews.Author: George E. Creel
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera last August (or September) at Sam's Club for 218.00 plus tax. It was the first 18MP point and shoot I had seen PLUS 10X zoom... and I haven't seen it at Sam's Club since, not sure what happened.  It replaced a 14MP Sony 5X lens point and shoot that my wife now carries.The Camera:  GREAT!!  I still have my 18MP Canon 60D 18MP DSLR, but I only use it for archival and document work on a tripod.  This Sony stays on my belt in a cell phone carrier and I use it all the time.  I don't know the amount of shots I've taken, but it's got to be over 10,000 since I bought it.  I have taken so many photos just because it's alway there.  I purchased 2 10X SDHC 16GB cards and two extra batteries and a combo 12V/wall charger, which I keep in my truck.  I use the after market batteries first because they have a more mAh ratings than the stock Sony battery.  I don't use a tripod with this camera and get good image results.  I've been able to identify birds at a distance with the image from this camera at 10X zoom that I could not identify with my 7X35 binoculars.  So, it's a good camera.  The video is fine.  The panoramic feature works okay, but I've gotten better results using individual images and stitching them together with PhotoShop.... or whatever program you wish. It takes more time that I expected to save an image and get ready for the next shot, but I've been spoiled by my Canon which will burn 90 or so shots in a row.  But this Sony is a grand cheaper.I like mine.  I recommend this camera highly.

Reviews.Title: Great Speed!!
Reviews.Author: Mother of Four
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace my old canon point and shoot, and this is by far a better product! The speed from the moment you turn it on is ten times faster.  And the quality of photos just as crisp.  Totally satisfied with my purchase!!

Reviews.Title: Outside shots are great but inside color seemed distorted & pictures not sharp.
Reviews.Author: Vickie
Reviews.Content: Outside shots are great but inside color seemed distorted & pictures not sharp.  Maybe I need to take off automatic setting for indoor shots - anybody have any ideas on this?

Reviews.Title: hi
Reviews.Author: Arun
Reviews.Content: I liked it .... working as expected no errors as of now luckily.. but the cost is little bit more :) i got the shipment nearly 1 month from the date of order

Reviews.Title: Best point and shoot I ever had
Reviews.Author: Steven L. Husted
Reviews.Content: I take photos for work everyday and this camera is so compact and easy to discreetly take photos. The picture quality is great compared to any coolpix or easyshare I've owned. Definitely worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Excelente camara
Reviews.Author: Victor López
Reviews.Content: Fotos copn una nitidez acorde al producto, las fotos nocturnas son muy buenas, empaque sellado con accesorios 100% original y recomendado

Reviews.Title: ISO 12800 but still a poor low-light camera
Reviews.Author: compsolve
Reviews.Content: Whether this is good camera depends on individual usage and perspective. This camera is great under good lighting condition without doing too much scrutiny:Macro focusing is good even in zoom (Panasonic Lumix SZ7 has great trouble).Video quality is great and optical zoom adjust automatically according to image resolution and works smoothly with minimum lens movement noise pickups. Sound pickup is also pretty good.However under slightly challenging or low-light conditions, the image quality is poor and cannot withstand any close inspection.One explanation is the S/N of Exmor R CMOS Sensor. Another One is the small lens max aperture f=3.3 in order to implement the 10x optical zoom. 5x optical zoom in this price range of cameras usually have max aperture f=2.7 and thus have better low-light performance.To compensate its low-light inadequacy, Sony adds iAuto+ (Superior Auto) picture mode by automatically taking multiple shots and processed them together. Not a very useful feature in my opinion. Instead improve current Anti-Blur feature.Judging based on specification only, the new 2013 replacement model DSC-WX300 (20x optical zoom, max f=3.5, max ISO 12800) to be released in April 2013 will not fair any better in still image quality. However I do like DSC-WX300 more standard conventional buttons layout and all metal case construction.Features that can be easily added in firmware to make the camera more usable are adding at least one more still image size selection in 16:9 and 4:3. In P mode, display ISO during focusing and in ISO Auto, settable low and high ISO limits.

Reviews.Title: Sony camera.
Reviews.Author: injunear
Reviews.Content: I have gotten some good photos with this camera.  I find the shutter release a little sensitive and have taken multiple photos at times.

Reviews.Title: An Incredible Upgrade
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is my second Sony Cyber-shot camera, which is an upgrade from my 7.2 mp.  I began taking pictures as soon as I got it.  The zoom feature is incredible and the clarity of the pictures is just awesome.  I can't wait for sunny weather to start taking more pictures!

Reviews.Title: Crystal clear
Reviews.Author: Lake Dweller
Reviews.Content: There are features on the camera that allow for a clear picture even though the camera may be moving... or the subject.  Love that.  No more blurry pics.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Angela Smith
Reviews.Content: I got the camera this afternoon.  Only used it for a couple hours.I am just an average person taking average pictures and this is going to be perfect for me.  I had no problem getting it set up with my laptop I just followed the directions.  Took a few pictures of my daughter in her bouncer in low light and they came out much better then I was expecting considering she wasn't holding very still.  Processing time between pictures was a couple seconds using a class 10 16gb SD card.  Uploaded easily via usb to Sony PlayMemories reduced a little red eye and uploaded to Facebook.  At 10M they didn't take long to upload.Camera seems sturdy enough.  Well built but small enough that I can carry it in my purse or diaper bag (in a case of course) without it adding extra bulk or weight.So far I have nothing negative to say about this camera and I looked pretty hard for something to be wrong.  For me its perfect.

Reviews.Title: mejorado
Reviews.Author: Cristian Toalongo "Cristian T."
Reviews.Content: muy buen productotodos debirian de comprar estose los recomiendo, es completamente excelente y tamaño y calidadenvió rápido....

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Pedro
Reviews.Content: It's exactly what I wanted: a point and shoot with a fine optical zoom and smart functions.  My wife expended the triple to buy a semi-pro fancy cam, but in fact I take 3 times the photos she takes.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Brandon Lester
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my mother. She loves it and uses it everyday. She especially loves the fact that you can watch videos taken with it on her HD TV. I'm happy that she's happy.

Reviews.Title: The Best Camera for an amateur wannabe photographer :-)
Reviews.Author: NeetNix
Reviews.Content: I always loved taking pictures but this camera encourages me to take it to another level with all the awesome effects it offers. I bought this as a Christmas gift to myself and no other gidt compared.  The room could be lit with a candle & the picture will come out looking like you had all the lights on. The clarity is unbelievable! Even on shots taken a distance away. Its very lite in weight & small. The only thing missing is a Photoshop type function but that's on my wish list not a defect. If you enjoy taking pictures this camera is for you.

Reviews.Title: Fussy daughter loves this camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have bought cheaper cameras in the past and they never got used or the pictures were disappointing. I finally splurged and bought this for my daughter. Now she is "miss popular" for the great shots it displays. Everyone wants to have her camera take group pics. :)

Reviews.Title: We love it!
Reviews.Author: Jaths
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my fiance for anniversary and we couldn't be happier. As a common people using camera for common stuff, there is nothing better. We recommend this very much!

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Ivan "Iv@n"
Reviews.Content: I found very good is 100% recommended hope to buy another look as they are very responsible I would recommend them to other future purchase thanks

Reviews.Title: Great bargain!
Reviews.Author: Ramos
Reviews.Content: It is a great camera with nice features. The camera shakes a little when lense expand completely. Great quality pics.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Catherine Slowicki
Reviews.Content: Love the lightweight.  Ease of use and quality of photos.I thought price was a bit too high and cannot see in viewer outdoors.  I took photos outdoors and just guessed and they turned out okay.I purchased it from recommendations on the internet that recommended it.  Am very satisfied after using my camera for 2 months.

Reviews.Title: Just what we were looking for
Reviews.Author: Sandra Pearson
Reviews.Content: I will start with a disclaimer; I am not a camera expert.  We bought this camera with some fairly simple requirements in mind.  We wanted to take picutres to share with friends, mostly on socail media sites.  We wanted a camera that was easy to carry with us (in contrast to more cumbersome and expensive Sony models we also own.) We take pictures in locations where our equipment and camera sit on the floor and are subject to accidents or theft,  Once again, we thought it would be  more convenient to switch to a small camera that would stay with us in a pocket or purse. And we wanted it to look contemporary and cool.  We really love the blue metallic color.We did look at various brands and price points.  We are very satisfied to date with our purchase of the Sony Cybershot DSC-WX150.  It has a lot of fun and useful features, it is relaitvely easy to use (we are still exploring all of the modes and menus) and is not so expensive that you have to worry excessively about loss or breakage.Oh yes.  Most importantly, our pictures look great!

Reviews.Title: Great features! Love the Panoramic option
Reviews.Author: shoesRagrlsbstfriend
Reviews.Content: Nice amount of Mega Pixels, clear pictures.  Love all the extra settings that you can use.  Buy a second memory card to go with it if you are taking lots of photos, as the one that came with mine can take/store around 100 photos.

Reviews.Title: Excellent photos; 10x magnification very useful
Reviews.Author: Kathleen King
Reviews.Content: Very good pictures.  Access door to battery and camera "chip" is too fragile.  Very thin and easy to carry anywhere.  I did a lot of research at the time of purchase.  My stepson also recommended it to me and he purchased one, also

Reviews.Title: Great little camera.
Reviews.Author: Gennaro Jerry
Reviews.Content: A bit more complicated to operate than my older camera, because it has everything on it. I'm still learning to use all it's features.  So far the pictures are amazingly sharp and clear. It's a perfect size to slip into a shirt pocket and take anyware with you.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Rodolfo Sierra
Reviews.Content: This Camera is great in all the functions it had, works great, it has a beautifull zoom and takes awesome pictures...

Reviews.Title: Does not connect to PC
Reviews.Author: SLEEPDOC
Reviews.Content: Bought a Nikon Coolpix 8100 about a year ago. I loved it, but dropped it.  It no longer worked, so I bought this camera instead.  This one is considerably more difficult to use than it needs to be.  Trying to figure out how to change settings is so much more difficult with this camera.  And I was really disappointed to find out that you can't connect the camera to a PC.  I tried every solution I could find online to address this problem.  The only way to get pics off the camera, as far as I can tell, is to make sure they go to the SD card.  Then, you have to remove the SD card and load to your PC that way.  I prefer to be able to connect the device to the PC and transfer them.  I wish I had gotten another Nikon Coolpix.

Reviews.Title: Excellent features, fair price
Reviews.Author: Hector Scelza
Reviews.Content: I had a DSC-WX5 camera since 2010. This is a great update at half the price I've paid by then. It's just what I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: thanks
Reviews.Author: Doug Thiel
Reviews.Content: great camera. this is my second one and i can take some awesome photos when i want. its handy and compact which i like.

Reviews.Title: Good performance but
Reviews.Author: J. Walker
Reviews.Content: The picture quality and speed are very good. It has a decent set of extra features. The 10x optical zoom on a camera this small is impressive. However, it doesn't seem as well built as other cameras in this price range. The top of the camera has someflex to it and the battery door doesn't close very snugly when the battery is in the camera. Also the zoom lens has more flex to it than expected. I doubt this camera would survive more than a few drops.

Reviews.Title: Great product, smaller than my old broken unit with many more features.
Reviews.Author: Ken Matthews
Reviews.Content: Great size & performance in a small package. My requirement is that it easily fits into my pocket! As they say its hard to get a great picture if your donot have your camera with you! I love it!

Reviews.Title: Solid Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: Bobaloo
Reviews.Content: This is a decent camera. While I would prefer an old school SLR where things are simple and there are not too many variables, this is a serviceable point and shoot camera. Over the course of 450 shots in Southeast Asia, as long as I did not get crazy with my shots, the camera performed well. Image stabilization could be better, but for a pocket camera that does not need a lot of thinking, this Sony did the job. Please note that the rating reflects performance for the price paid, not "wow, its takes the best pictures I have ever seen!" I took pictures from a van, side roads, and even on a bike. Controls were actually easier than many point and shoots, and the easy mode was great for my wife.All in all, I like it at it's price point, but don't expect really great results from this camera.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX150 18.2 MP Exmor R CMOS Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: bmho
Reviews.Content: I am not a pro. I just need a good camera to take everywhere with me, even when I don't take my bag or purse, and take high-quality shots at sunlight or dark or indoors. I had experience with hybrid cameras, and try to learn take good "artistic" pictures, too. This camera satisfies all I need.The picture quality is excellent, sharp and colors are great. I love to play with effects (painting, toy etc). My hands shake, but this camera can fix itself accordingly and my pictures are sharp again. My biggest concern was night shots and they turned out to be great,too. I got great Mardi Gras pictures with it!I wasn't really looking for a great video quality but wow, this one has that,too. I started to film my trips and I enjoy watching them!I can take it everywhere with me. It's in my pocket!The problem with this camera is you definitely need an extra battery and an extra charger for a trip. Also, the lens part feels a little flimsy, you may need to be careful. It is perfect for my little fingers but I am not sure if guys will like it too.

Reviews.Title: Good camera.  Coloring off.  Zoom not crystal clear at 10x optical.
Reviews.Author: L. B. Keller
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera (DSC-WX150) and the Sony DSC-HX10V.  I ran various home grown tests on both cameras under various conditions: action, with flash, without flash, zoom, natural light, etc.  Both cameras were set to the "automatic smart green setting".  Consistently the WX150 (this camera) had a blueish hint to the photos - as in a vivid purple iris looked blue not purple like real life.  We have oak bookcases.  Comparing photos side by side with both cameras, the bookcases with the WX150 didn't have the golden undertones.  The DSC-HX10V photos were much more true to color in all photo testing.  We called Sony about the blue issue and they said it must be a defective unit.  That may be the case.  I can only report on my experience.On the zoom test, I put both cameras to 10X optical and turned digital zoom off (note the HX10V has optical zoom to 16X).  I took pictures of the spines of my kids books from across the room.  The edges of the letters with the WX150 (this camera) were "noisy" whereas the HX10V at 10x optical were very clear (no, I did not pixel peep).  If you don't plan to do a lot of detailed zooming because you can be closer to your subject, this should be no big deal.  I take pictures of my kids swimming from the stands - I need a decent zoom without lugging a DSLR or hybrid.Both cameras performed about the same on action shots.  I had my kids jump on the bed for several minutes while my husband and I took photos with both cameras at the same time.  The HX10V does have a true sports mode which helped to reduce the blur some.  I still had to take a bunch to get the lucky action shots on both cameras.Note: all pictures were taken from the same distance, compared side by side, at the same size on the same monitor.  In other words this was as scientific as an average camera owner (not photographer) would do.  Ultimately we opted for the HX10V for the extra $60-$70.The only thing I liked better about the WX150 is the flash is built in whereas the HX10V's flash is a pop up and it is right where I want to hold the camera with the left hand (very annoying).  Though the HX10V flash is brighter and goes a farther distance.This is a great camera for many people.  I spend a lot of time making digital photo story books of our family every year so I wanted the best compact camera I could afford.  I wish this 150 didn't have the blue hue issue or we would have chosen it instead.I hope this helps the average camera buyer.  You will see a similar review on the Sony Cybershot DSC-HX10V.

Reviews.Title: Great for casual photos
Reviews.Author: Erika
Reviews.Content: I have a canon powershot sx40 HS, and I bought this because sometimes it is hard to carry the canon. Of course the sony is not as good as the canon, so it is difficult to take many pictures and to get some of them blurry... It'll be okay if I use flashlight, i know. Anyways... Like I said, it's perfect for casual photos, when you just can't use such a big camera :)

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: nose in book
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a trip to Australia. It fits in your shorts pocket comfortably. It has an incredible zoom. I took many shots across Sydney Harbor about 8 miles away and got terrific views of Sydney. It also does close ups well. I found the controls intuitive to use.

Reviews.Title: Best point and shoot camera!
Reviews.Author: Michael Torres
Reviews.Content: I had cannon and panasonic in the past and after reading a whole bunch of reviews here on Amazons on different cameras, I decided to give this one a shot... I bought it before heading to a long vacation trip outside the country and as soon as I received it in the mail I started playing with it and wasn't all that impressed at first.... Once I started using it on our vacation though, learning all the many different settings, and the way the camera uses those settings so well on auto mode, I just immediately fell in love with it.. and once I uploaded my photos to my laptop and saw how nice and clear  the pictures came out, and the way the effects made some of my shots so much better I fell in love with this camera even more.... The only downside with this camera is that it doesn't produces great shots in the dark regardless of the settings and that it doesn't take raw pictures but other than that it's cheap and it's a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Pictures
Reviews.Author: Chris Easterbrook
Reviews.Content: Needed a decent point and shoot and this one fits the bill perfectly. I haven't taken a video with it but it does take very good pics. Overall I am very happy with it and would recommend it to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: happy with the purchase
Reviews.Author: Seattle Adam
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife for Christmas and she like it.  It goes from off to "ready to take a picture" in a heartbeat.  It is also pretty easy to use.  Maybe the only improvement that I'd like to see would be if it came with a stand alone battery charger instead of just the USB one.  That's just a minor, personal preference, though.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!
Reviews.Author: Weesie
Reviews.Content: Incredible photos, great price! Love the small, thin profile of this camera just wish it had come with a carrying case.

Reviews.Title: Great little performance point-and-shoot
Reviews.Author: A. Gill
Reviews.Content: OK, so it's not going to wow any pro photographers. But you miss 100% of the shots you don't take, and an unwieldy pro/prosumer setup is hard to carry around, so you don't carry it unless you expect there to be great shots. This is so tiny I can keep it in my pocket wherever I am and take decent shots. Even works in low-light environments, and video is good.

Reviews.Title: Value for money
Reviews.Author: Osama Ahmed
Reviews.Content: If you want a simple and features loaded camera , this model is your choice. Not only shoots but also it can make full HD videos.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot 18.2 MP
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: Great camera, love the features, and was a great deal. Seems like a perfect camera to take with one anywhere though one may want a second battery,

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: faithfulone
Reviews.Content: Love this camera. It has all the features needed to take great pics!  It is easy to hold and use.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: LuvMika
Reviews.Content: Needed a camera and this was it!  The blue is beautiful and the picture's are clear and sharp. Very pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Travels well
Reviews.Author: Samuel M Laird
Reviews.Content: I took it to Eastern Europe recently and it did everything I needed with ease. Nice compactness and increased zoom were great. The "on" button seems a little reluctant compared to my former Elph but I just have to get used to that.

Reviews.Title: Great experience
Reviews.Author: Salsera "Kiki"
Reviews.Content: Extremely happy with purchase. Was reluctant to purchase a digital camera online as oppose to in store but the price was right and went for it. Glad I did, this camera is amazing and vendor shipped it next day without charging me next day or shipping fee for that matter. Will definitely shop with this vendor again!

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot
Reviews.Author: Maltese Breeder
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my son and his girlfriend so they could take pictures of my new granddaughter.  It works great and we can download pictures to the computer to be printed.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Kdude
Reviews.Content: I've been using my very old 10 MP Cannon digital camera, and this was a great replacement. Picture quality was much much better. 10x optical zoom is very nice and awesome for the size of this camera. Its got so much features. I love the pano and the 10x frame shoot per second feature is nice to have. I would recommend this camera to my friends.I bought this on Black Friday 2012 for a very very good deal.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Love the features of this camera.  I did a lot of research on cameras before I made my decision.  The last camera I bought was also a Sony Cybershot.  It was the Cybershot MPEGMOVIE VX DSC-P200 so its been a while since I have gotten a new camera.  I would recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Patricia Correia "PatiMonster"
Reviews.Content: Love this little camera it's excellent for someone who doesn't want to mess with the settings so much to get a great picture. I love it

Reviews.Title: Pictures Pictures Pictures
Reviews.Author: icycalamitykate
Reviews.Content: I love the size of the camera and yet it takes marvelous - detailed photos.  I can carry it anywhere (but a guy needs to be careful cause I lost one at a trailride last summer) and I expecially like the zoom.

Reviews.Title: Powerful yet Compact
Reviews.Author: Ray Adams
Reviews.Content: Lots of features I haven't fully explored, pictures look great so far. I've had fun with some of the effects, especially the "animation" which makes the picture look like a line drawn cartoon.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: JRS200x
Reviews.Content: I was very pleasantly surprised by this camera.  It couldn't be easier to use and it really does take some great quality pictures in most light.  I am not completely enamored with its low light picture quality but it is by no means BAD, just not as great as the pictures it takes in good lighting, but really, I didn't expect amazing performance from it based its price.The screen is bright and clear and makes setting up your pictures and framing everything properly extremely easy.Overall, if you are looking for a good camera, especially for the money and arent looking for professional level picture quality, this is a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey L Pulfer
Reviews.Content: Less bulky than the DSC-W170, which I replaced with this one.  Shoots better pictures as well and has more features.  The only real issue is finding all of the features.

Reviews.Title: Really nice camera
Reviews.Author: JViteri
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent camera. I was looking for something compact but that would take nice pictures and this camera does both.  Very clear pictures. Great zoom and nice features.

Reviews.Title: Lightweight, easy to use, high quality photos
Reviews.Author: Dr. Z
Reviews.Content: I like the ease of use, the lightness, and the quality of the photos.  I used it for the first time in SE Asia and I was complimented by many people on my photos.  I'm very happy with the camera.The instruction manual was pretty useless, so it takes a little time to figure out all the options by clicking through the buttons/menus.

Reviews.Title: Execelente
Reviews.Author: Nestor Mora
Reviews.Content: Tiene un tamaño muy bueno, la calidad de sus fotos son excelentes, tiene la fotografia panoramica 180° es muy buena, la recomiendo

Reviews.Title: Excelent camera
Reviews.Author: Jose Luis
Reviews.Content: It's very good! It has a great resolution, very easy to use, carry and incredible 10x zoom. I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Nice compact camera with some decent feature. Lens is good without too much aberration. The focusing is a bit noisy.
Reviews.Author: Fredrique von Knerker "TGOM"
Reviews.Content: Nice compact camera with some decent feature. Lens is good without too much aberration. The focusing is a bit noisy.

Reviews.Title: Good little camera
Reviews.Author: peter1007
Reviews.Content: I love the zoom on this camera and for a point and shoot...... this little thing takes crisp pictures but I just wish that someone could make a camera that is as faster between shots. I don't mean the burst mode but high speed shot after shot. I love this for what it is, a great little camera that I have just in case I don't have my DSLR handy but I miss some great moments. Overall this is as good a point and shoot for the money you can find!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera For The Money!
Reviews.Author: Ron B.
Reviews.Content: I owned an earlier model Sony Cyber-Shot, so it was an easy choice.  The improvements now included are SUPER! And at a price I could not pass up.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: luvshepherds
Reviews.Content: Love this camera!  I researched them for a while.  This takes great pictures.  I like the fact I can plug it in to charge it and not have to carry batteries with me at all times.

Reviews.Title: Great pics amazing video
Reviews.Author: sk
Reviews.Content: First a warning: I am not a camera expert at all. That being said I do know what good pictures look like and I have been searching for a year for a camera that takes good point and shoot pics. I have bought and returned other models before settling on this and i am very happy. The only issue I had was in some indoor pics depending on the lighting the picture got a little overexposed. I think that if I knew more about taking pictures I could rectify this for the most part on my own. The vidoes were excellent. I'm really happy with this camera so far and i'm hard to please. Annoyance: to recharge the battery you have to plug the camera in. I don't know hat they were thinking.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Andrew Henningsen
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. It has the fastest auto focus I've ever seen. I also love all the cool special effects that it can do.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for my 12 year old.
Reviews.Author: Stephen Mutch
Reviews.Content: Small light and easy to handle.Takes some stunning shot. Great point and shott camera.Does sometimes struggle in less than optimum light.Auto focus can be a be bit problematic but daughter still learning.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: LW
Reviews.Content: Great camera, I bought this for one of my daughters after my older daughter bought a simular sony camera and liked it alot.The camera takes great photos quiclky with an easy menu. I would recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: excellent bit of kit & service
Reviews.Author: peter stevenson
Reviews.Content: Very quick delivery does everything I want it to do at a good price. I would recommend this camera to anyone who wants a digital piece of kit with lots of features but easy to operate easy to carry.

Reviews.Title: poor picture quality, cheap construction
Reviews.Author: Mike D "Mike"
Reviews.Content: This camera is not terrible but does not live up to the reviews.  At the 18.2 MP resolution 100% zoom looks terrible with lots of noise, distortion, and artifacts.  Reducing the resolution to around 10 MP fixes this.  Is 18.2 MP just a marketing gimmick?  The camera does some funny color shifting.  I'm just sure my baby does not have purple hair, but some of the pictures from this camera sure make it look as if he does.  The camera feels flimsy, there are gaps between plastic parts, and a significant amount of give when you grip it.  Finally, there is significant distortion, especially toward the edges of the pictures.  I'm not sure if this is a consequence of the very small lens on this camera or something else, but one would think with all the image processing capabilities they could have thought to correct for the distortion.  Disappointing coming from Sony.

Reviews.Title: best bang for your buck
Reviews.Author: ProductTester808
Reviews.Content: are you serious people of course this camera is nothing compared to a professional photography camera and no where in its description does it even say it has wifi, stop complaining this was one of the best inexpensive cameras I have ever owned and though its on its last legs it still produces great shots so quite yapping and return it if your unsatisfied. l;ook at the year these came out lol

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: carlos molina
Reviews.Content: very good product has everything you wanted guaranteed a very superor camera to other models, its crisp, about videos like very good mare

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Delogirl
Reviews.Content: Love this camera! Takes great pictures and high quality video. It is not as good as an "expensive" camera but it does the job for me!

Reviews.Title: amazing camera!
Reviews.Author: J. Williams
Reviews.Content: I would definitely recommend this camera for those wanting amazing pictures with a simple point& shoot. The lensis great & the zoom is really good especially in natural light. The new features are great. Overall thus is a great camera to buy!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful low light P&S; camera
Reviews.Author: Raj Girish
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a good P&S; camera for family. I did not have any bias towards any brand. I tried a few and finally ended up with this Sony WX150.* Good optical zoon of 10X is more than enough for day to day photos.* Low light photos - This was one of my criteria. Oh boy, it takes very good low light pictures.* Image quality - Takes clear, vibrant photos.* Pocket size -  Good size and weight for anyone to carry in shirt pocket or women's carry bag* Many more features just enough for a excellent P&S.; Smile detection actually works. That is COOL. Background defocus is useful sometimes.Overall very happy with this camera

Reviews.Title: Gift for a friend
Reviews.Author: Liz
Reviews.Content: They love their new camera! They love to take pics and wore out their first cyber-shot and had to have another (newer and better version)!

Reviews.Title: It's a nice point and shoot
Reviews.Author: austinTX
Reviews.Content: I'm between three and four stars (so I chose four). The camera is small and easy to stow away in a purse or a pocket which is exactly what I was looking for. I have a Nikon D5100 (a DSLR which rocks my world) Nikon D5100 16.2MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 AF-S DX VR Nikkor Zoom Lens and was looking for an extra camera to take with me when I'm out and about. This camera pretty much fits the bill. I am still trying to figure out how to adjust the flash because it tends to overexpose the photo which is my only real frustration with the camera. The black and white feature is neat but your subject matter needs to be rather still if you are inside (need a flash). I wish it was faster but the detail is good and over all I'm happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Sexy
Reviews.Author: tjiang93
Reviews.Content: Looks sexy, Amazing image quality! better than some DSLRS i seen as well. 10x optical zoom is amazing! The design looks sexy! Way better image quality than my Sony Cybershot AA3300, Been to California with this and i regret not having it earlier for my Florida and China vacation. I only have one minor complaint but its so minor that I will still give it a 5. The battery is a bit smaller (250 shots) give or take. The battery if its in the camera will also drain battery, i notice that my battery was 25% just by having it in my camera for about 4 days and not shooting any pictures. But thats very minor and the battery will not change with a one day or night standby. I also bought another battery for it and its better than the one that comes with the camera so battery life is great right now! Must get screen protector for the back screen, its not gorilla glass but its expected. For the price, weight, design, and pure sexyness I def recommend. Will continue to buy! This also has a almost unheard of 4.5/5 stars rating from PCMAG and they are tough graders! Dam Im usually too lazy to write reviews for stuff but this one deserves a review from me!

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot
Reviews.Author: JLS
Reviews.Content: Great product! Takes nice snap shots and videos of all our horse events.  The slim design is especially appreciated because it slips into your pocket and you're ready to go. Highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: 10 X Zoom and Zoomable while taking Movies WONDERFUL ! !
Reviews.Author: Steven E. Holian
Reviews.Content: I need more Batteries, and the 10 X Zoom and Zoomable while taking Movies WONDERFUL ! !I nee a normal 120Volt Battery Charger; the unit comes with the USB and 120 Volt Adapter for using only one Battery.I use multiple Batteries at the Drag Racing Trak @Famoso.com

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot camera!
Reviews.Author: Melanie Berger
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research while looking for a point and shoot camera, I am glad I stumbled upon this gem! I was looking for a point and shoot camera without a lot of shutter lag. Sony hit the mark with this one.. No, it's not dslr quality but close for a point and shoot this is a great camera. It is very sleek, lightweight, and user friendly. I am very happy with my purchase, Sony has yet to let me down with their products. This camera is rated one of the top point and shoot cameras for 2012.

Reviews.Title: It is OK.
Reviews.Author: Charlie Alberto Dos Ramos "Char's"
Reviews.Content: I am using my camara everytime and it is ok. Really I recomended it product. A-1. Wonderfull and Amazing Camara.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: D. Mason
Reviews.Content: LOVE IT!! 2ND SONY, LOVE THE PIXELS AND THE ZOOM!PICTURES ARE BEAUTIFUL AND I REALLY REALLY WILL TELL MANY ABOUT IT...

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera.  I upgraded from an older Sony cybershot and the improvements are amazing.  Much faster shutter time and really clear pictures.  I have not had any problems so far.

Reviews.Title: I use it for point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: I am not into cameras enough to go into specific detail on specifications or any of that.  I just use this for point and shoot.  It takes great pictures.  This is my 2nd Cyber-shot.  I had my 1st 1 for a few years.  The only thing is that it takes a few seconds to process between pictures.  My other Cyber-shot was the same.  I think that is just how cameras like this are.  If you want something that is instantaneous you probably need to spend more money.  This does exactly what I need when I need it to.  I also like the multi-shot feature.  If you are trying to take action shots or something that is happening quickly it takes a ton of shots back to back.  Out of those I can usually get a few good shots of what I was trying for.  For example, I my kids are preschool age.  If they are on a ride and I'm trying to get a good picture of them I'll turn on this feature and I can get a few good shots out of all that were taken.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera!
Reviews.Author: H. Fugate
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!  I love that it's lightweight and takes great pictures in low-light.  Considering the price was pretty good, it's not a bad little camera.  Buy it, you won't be sorry.

Reviews.Title: love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Stacey French
Reviews.Content: Cracked the screen on our last small camera.  Have a nice (but big) Canon, so didn't need anything fancy, but wanted it to do video, too.  This camera is great!!  The video is crystal clear HD...would've switched sooner if I knew how clear this one would be!!  I love that you can also take still shots while you are videoing--great bonus.  Easy to use out of the box once we figured out how to make the annoying beep stop every time you took a pic.  Has bunches of good settings, etc. but haven't gotten that far yet.

Reviews.Title: Good little camera
Reviews.Author: SBK
Reviews.Content: This has been a good little camera thus far. I've mainly been using it on automatic and burst and those have worked great. I still need to play around with the other functions.

Reviews.Title: Nice product
Reviews.Author: Sinbad
Reviews.Content: Tiny but with lots of functions. Easy to use. Like the panoramic shooting mode. The button on the right top of the camera change the shooting mode from regular to panoramic to video easily. Loaded with anti-shaking mode, and background blurry mode (kinda gives SLR fort of feeling when shooting close objects).Cons: shutter speed a little slow. Panoramic shooting is hard to control and always ended with a partial image (i.e. a little portion to the right of the picture is black), which is probably due to the sweeping speed.

Reviews.Title: I'm hooked
Reviews.Author: J. Janice
Reviews.Content: I am a fuji camera girl every camera i've had was a fuji. I choose this one because of the optical zoom and pixels and i'm so hooked its small and accomplishes everything i have with my fuji the size is perfect not bulky fits right in my purse. I do reccomend getting extra batteries they only last about 120 pics on a high setting.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: brucer
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture quality,  with easy to use features.  More than adequate zoom and flawless steady shot setting.  Large 3" display that is very  readable.  Works well with Windows editing program.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Leonard P. Arends
Reviews.Content: takes fantastic pictures. Haven't had the problems with the lens that others seem to have. Have to watch where I hold the camera so my big fingers don't get in the way.

Reviews.Title: great "point and shoot" camera.
Reviews.Author: D. B. Sodee "RPG gamer"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife to replace a really cheap camera that was junk.  This camera is simple to use and take perfect pictures for the money.  It has a great optical zoom and the camera is very small and easy to hide away in her purse.  Fast and very good low light pictures for sports and capturing the kids growing up.  Excellent overall quality, software and ease of use.

Reviews.Title: The Best camera I've ever owned
Reviews.Author: Danielle
Reviews.Content: Though I haven't had any "professional" camera's prevously, this camera is HD on levels that I adore, the effects are fun to play around with, and the video quality is Amazing. For the price I bought it, this camera was an absolute steal!

Reviews.Title: Is handy, quick , amazing video quality and other features, but captures noise at the pixel level
Reviews.Author: Aquib Rashid
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera, I paid 250Euros for it to be imported from New York. Paid extra customs as it was not available here. Is handy, has quick response time and many interesting features, very good video quality, automatically focuses on changing objects and changing environment, but one of the biggest flaws is found when you zoom in the picture after been taken. The image has a lot of noise and you can see smeared colored dots. I guess for the amount of money, its ok, or may be best if you can get if for around 200 Euros.

Reviews.Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this little guy!
Reviews.Author: AReader
Reviews.Content: I am so in love with this little camera!  It is TINY but MIGHTY!  I am no professional, but I have had multiple compliments and inquiries as to my camera from the Christmas pics I posted online.  I did a bit of research before I finally purchased this camera.  Love the high megapixels (it takes super crisp clear photos!) and the great zoom (10X to 20X and still sharp looking!).  It is easy to use and very portable...I didn't realize how small it is, but now I am used to it (and excited because, even in a case, it easily fits in my diaper bag or purse!).  Great value for the money.  The price here seems to be the cheapest I've seen, though it does fluctuate.  I saved some $$ and went with the blue one.  Love it!  Great buy.  If debating, pull the trigger!  I am glad I did!

Reviews.Title: Great compact camera
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: The size is great on this camera, its small enough to fit in your pocket. Impressive zoom for this small of a camera. No complaints.

Reviews.Title: Best Camera
Reviews.Author: Dien Nguyen
Reviews.Content: Love it. Very low price for all the available features. Compared to other cameras available on the market. This camera should be sold for $400.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful little camera
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: I like almost everything about this camera.This is my first new camera in 5 years and is way better than the cannon I had.  It takes spectacular pictures.I've been taking a course on photography and would have liked a manual mode which allows shutter and aperture priorities.  I can trick the camera into doing some of this.Great camera.  Comes with neither a manual nor memory card.

Reviews.Title: Sony Camera Tops in my books
Reviews.Author: Fiorentino
Reviews.Content: Great camera and clear photos. I do think 4GM SD card should come with it, so it is a complete package.

Reviews.Title: My wife could understand it
Reviews.Author: Frank McFarland
Reviews.Content: A higher capability camera that a novice can learn to use quickly for stills and movies. My wife at 70 years of age and with no background with digital cameras was clicking away and getting great pictures on Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Just Great
Reviews.Author: Suddie
Reviews.Content: wanted a sleek, compact, easy to use but good camera. This is ALL of it!! vibrant color & great clarity.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Karen L. Miller "Karen"
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use. Great little camera. The pictures printed out beautifully.My husband has large hands and finds it hard to use.

Reviews.Title: Love It!!!
Reviews.Author: Amanda Robinson
Reviews.Content: This is by far an awesome camera!!!! I have to say it totally blew my expectations away! Love it!!!!! Easy to handle and very easy to work. Great buy and awesome pictures.

Reviews.Title: very nice!
Reviews.Author: James Macintosh "Jimmymac"
Reviews.Content: bought as a Christmas gift, this camera is very nice, easy to use, lots of options, and takes great pics.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX150
Reviews.Author: Marjorie Watford
Reviews.Content: This camera is a replacement camera which I wore out.  It is perfect for using when we hike.  Easy to use.  Viewing screen is great.

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: RVS
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping and a great camera. I had a sony cybershot that is about 6 years old and just wanted an upgrade. The new cybershot exceeded my expectataions.

Reviews.Title: Excellent point and shoot Camera
Reviews.Author: ATech "ATech"
Reviews.Content: Really loved the quality of output from this camera in such a small body. Literally replaced the need to carry along an SLR when you need the flexibility of not carrying additional weight.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: R. C. Nziramasanga
Reviews.Content: Pretty good little camera for keeping in pocket and or belt. Takes good pics. Not as a good as my SLR but is great for use when travelling to places you don't want to lug an SLR and it's lenses to. Video quality is pretty good. It's black mark is sound quality but I don't expect that something this size would have a great mic.Good camera overall and would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great Pics and easy to use!
Reviews.Author: Golden Jewel
Reviews.Content: This camera was a gift for my daughter and she loves it.  It is easy to use and she loves all the features including digitial video and panaramic pictures.  It has great zoom.  We did a lot of comparison shopping before deciding on the Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX150 and based on her reaction and the quality of the pictures she has taken so far, we definitely made the right choice.  She also loves the size - it is small enough to put in her purse or pocket.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: patti
Reviews.Content: My son got this for Christmas and loves it !!!  Does alot of amazing things for such a small camera !!!

Reviews.Title: Nice!!
Reviews.Author: Sharon Panozzo
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my 13 year old daughter for her 8th grade class trip. She has taken TONS of pictures already and loves this camera. The screen is nice and big and the pictures are so clear. Nice camera for an amatuer!!

Reviews.Title: really love this!
Reviews.Author: Olga Schilk
Reviews.Content: This is really good camera for those who doesn't mess too much with the manual settings like me. Pretty good presets, fast shutter, small, cute, pictures quality just perfect - love it!

Reviews.Title: Superr!!
Reviews.Author: Mariela
Reviews.Content: La nitides de sus imagenes son super, flexible y facil de usar. Me encata la calidad de esta camara y las opciones que ofrece.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: gb
Reviews.Content: Exceeded our expectations. Amazing picture quality. Only drawback I feel is that it takes a second or two after the click to record it even for still pictures. But thats OK too...Overall very impressed.

Reviews.Title: A responsive point-n-shoot camera!
Reviews.Author: Mustang Sally "Diet Hater"
Reviews.Content: Got this as a Christmas gift, and I love it so far.  I've had several P&S; digital cameras, as well as a Nikon DSLR outfit.  This $200 point and shoot is perfect for capturing those moments and snapshots without carrying around a bulky DSLR kit.  Two things that impressed me the most:  (1) indoor pictures without flash, and (2) night shots outside without a tripod.  Both were very good and exceeded my expectations by far.This camera is speedy and responsive for a P&S.;  If it keeps impressing me like this, I will have to just sell the DSLR kit!

Reviews.Title: My review on my  Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-WX150
Reviews.Author: Eric Parlatore
Reviews.Content: I gave this camera 5 stars because I can't find anything bad about it.The camera takes amazing pics and video and has so many features you can't go wrong.I am a new Sony user as I have only had Samsung or Canon cameras so this one I have to get used too but awesome camera so far.Crystal clear pics and videos.My videos upload to my Windows 7 computer no issues and then I am able to edit videos for YouTube easily.I see some people saying they have issues viewing videos on computers.No issue here.Love this camera and I recommend it if you are looking for a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad point &shoot;
Reviews.Author: aztec506 "aztec506"
Reviews.Content: Not much to add to the positive reviews.  I always carry something like this in my satchel.  Fits the bill perfectly - small, cheap, decent pictures, nice zoom.  I docked it one star because a lot of my pictures taken utilizing the zoom were not sharp - too much internal noise removal.  Not trying to compare it to a dslr or anything, but compared to my Canons (SX40 & S95) the images are a less sharp.  I would recommend it to anyone looking for an inexpensive always have one around camera.

Reviews.Title: The Camera for anyone who wants a simple and tiny camera.
Reviews.Author: Braintree fan
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera to replace an 8 year old Sony 6mp point & shoot camera. The DSC-WX150 is cheaper than the old model and quite a lot less configurable. We've tried three or four cameras over the years and until now haven't been able to find an adequate replacement for it, not for 200 bucks anyway.This is a tiny camera, we have it set to 6:4 picture shape or postcard size as I always think this shape looks so much nicer when emailing or printing images. The default aspect is 4:3 the same shape as the cameras sensor so like an old fashioned TV screen. By setting aspect to 6:4 does mean a pair of small blank strips to the he top and bottom of the monitor screen. This also brings down the number of pixels in play from 18mp to a more manageable 13mp - so more space on the card and your PC for images. Who needs 18mp pics anyway?Okay about the camera, first the few niggles and quibbles I have with it. The camera does a lot of smart processing of images, there is no raw or less compression settings, so you're basically stuck with this whether you like it or not - Ideal for anyone who who's not into post-processing. The result of this process is revealed when you look at images at full size, white faces look pink and smoothed with artifacts evident. This appears to be caused by some over-zealous noise removal. The flip side of which is the camera performs well in quite dark situations without needing flash. As with most things your gain can have consequences elsewhere,in this case cropping and blowing up a portion of the image isn't very rewarding to say the least. I would also have liked the usual menu item giving, vivid/bright/natural saturation options. This is not much to ask in a camera at any price level.That's the not so good, hows about the good and very good and there's plenty of that! The 10x optical zoom is smooth and there appears to be little image degradation at either wide or telephoto. The zoom works in movie mode. Movie mode? why bother? This is an excellent movie camera. My wife has a dedicated Sony DCR-SX65 handycam and this baby knocks the socks of it and it's full HD as well.  Pictures are sharp straight out of the camera with reasonable resolution, until you pixel peep, but we're looking at a $200 camera here and not a $1000 dSLR.
