We intend taking this camera which easily slips into a top pocket without bulging or weighing it down to Thailand and Cambodia next month, it looks exactly what we need.I agree with other feedbacks, grab yourself a replacement knockoff battery, they're as cheap as chips, we had one delivered to our home from China for $3.50. So for a few ommissions like the ability to choose some settings I can recommend this Sony for anyone looking for a cheap point and shoot which delivers sharp and decent resolution images in a very small case.

Reviews.Title: Better than anticipated
Reviews.Author: Steven Takahashi
Reviews.Content: This unit takes great photos when there is low light.  The pics in general are a bit softer than you would get with a Canon.  Recommend this for most people looking for a point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Stellar performer with poor battery capacity
Reviews.Author: quiske
Reviews.Content: The image quality of this tiny camera is the best I have ever had.  So far I have used it exclusively in the Intelligent Auto mode, and photos are invariably appropriately focused and usually appropriately exposed.  I say "usually" because the camera seems to have a different exposure philosophy than my Canons.  The Canons seem to play "by the book," underexposing to protect highlights.  Consequently I have to boost brightness of most of my photos in post processing.  The WX150 aims for correct exposure and pays the price of blown highlights in some situations.  I am happy with this tradeoff, and, if I weren't so lazy, I could easily make simple adjustments to prevent overexposure.  Video capability goes way beyond my Canons, as does the automatic panorama facility, though the latter is very poorly documented and hard to control, often requiring multiple attempts at the same shot.  One serious weakness of the camera is battery capacity.  I always carry an extra charged battery in a pocket of my camera case, and I have purchased an external charger.  Moreover, I have taken to removing the battery from the camera when the camera is not in use.  I have the impression that this gives me more shots.  For some potential buyers, poor battery capacity would be a deal breaker, but it is not that big an issue for me. I see it as a corollary of very small size, which is very important to me.

Reviews.Title: Really pleased with this camera
Reviews.Author: Roberta Alwin
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the camera.  The shots come out clear and the telephoto is nice.  Ease of use is great.  I don't want to have to stop and figure each shot, just want to point, shoot and get a good picture.  This one does that nicely.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber Shot
Reviews.Author: MOONWILLOWSINDIE
Reviews.Content: I needed a new camera.  After months of comparing, I settled on the Sony cyber Shot.  I owned one before and it was a very good camera.  I love the easy mode for ones like me who are not professionals, but want to take quality pictures.  I like the style and am happy with my purchase.  I would wait for a holiday sale closer than what I paid.  The day after I got what I thought was a good deal, the next day it was $20 cheaper and added a memory card.  Sony web site also had some better prices.  I bought mine from Amazon and still think it is the best place to buy online.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: melhsap "lcmshsadmin"
Reviews.Content: My wife enjoys photography and scrap booking and she likes simple cameras that take great pictures. This Sony fits the bill.

Reviews.Title: Terrific little camera!
Reviews.Author: Jeanne S. Dunn
Reviews.Content: I'm no photographer. I just wanted a little camera that took really good pix, and previous experience took me back to the Sony Cyber-shot. Yes... I tried the Nikon. Pleh. Just didn't do it for me. Canon. Nope. So back to Sony I went, and I am thrilled! It takes really wonderful pix for the non-photographer. :)

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Sylvia leventhal
Reviews.Content: For anyone who doesnt want to fuzz with toomany settings, this one has enough for wonderful memoriy pictures!Great buy!

Reviews.Title: love it so far
Reviews.Author: sugarchuck
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a camera to replace my old samsung that I loved, but this is even better. I mostly take shots of the grandchildren and pets and don't know how or have the time to fiddle around with settings when I want to take the shot. The only things I wanted was automatic settings, flash, zoom and video. This has it all and more(but you don't need to use the"more". It takes fantastic pictures just taking it out of your pocket and turn it on. I'll look into more that it has once I have time to sit and play with it. The zoom is excellent. Actually zooms in too fast, sometimes I need to back it up slowly. My grandaughter tends to stop smiling and not look when she sees the camera out. With this zoom, I've taken wonderful close up pictures because I'm not right on top of her and she doesn't know I'm trying to take a picture of her. Perfect camera for me. I don't like the touch screen cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Eric Sattler
Reviews.Content: Works great, nice pictures. I love that the shutter snaps immeidately when I press the button (no delay). Controls and settings are easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Hebert Suarez
Reviews.Content: Best camera point and shoot ever had.... small, light and grate pic... evereything you read in the publicacion this camera does. it consumen a lot of battery with the flash. but without it it lasts alot. grate  performan in a low light situations.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: AJ
Reviews.Content: Got this camera to replace my old Canon Powershot SD450. It takes great pictures. A friend took it to Puerto Rico and came back with pictures you'd expect to see on a DSLR. Impressed with the capabilities of such a little camera. I haven't gotten to use it too much yet since I just got it recently and my main camera is a Canon Rebel. But for days when I don't want to lug around my big camera, I'm looking forward to using this one.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: G'smomma
Reviews.Content: After researching myself into the ground I finally saw this camera on Amazon and read the reviews since the feedback on it was so good. Everyone was right, I am not a "techy" type person and this camera is just amazing. With 2 little ones always on the run it snaps action shots so clearly....I am thrilled with it!!

Reviews.Title: Simply excellent
Reviews.Author: karthik
Reviews.Content: Powers on/off in a flash. Excellent Response time. Outstanding Picture Quality. Better than cameras twice its price. I would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a light point and shoot camera that is easy to carry around, and shoots great pics and is inexpensive

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: dav
Reviews.Content: I'm sure there are many good convenient and quality cameras like this one, but after I researched the DSC-WX150 and saw Amazon's price it was a no brainer. This is a great little camera that takes great pics, great video, processes quickly, and is easy to use, at least for me. If you want good pictures from a very user friendly camera, I recommend this one. And also, thank you Amazon for your great prices and customer service. You have never let me down.

Reviews.Title: A great little camera (Edited)
Reviews.Author: E. Berg
Reviews.Content: This camera is very small, but impressively powerful.  I have had it for a few days now, and have found nothing that I do not like about it.  All the features in the list by Sony, work as promised; the only one I have not tried and am not really interested in, is the 3D feature.  But everything else is top notch.  I have taken pictures at 18.1 MP and cropped them down to only 1/5 of original size and have still had sharp pictures.  Impressive.  That is a feature that comes in handy if you have kids or pets running around away from you and you want to catch them from a distance.The HD video is also impressive, and I have had fun taking pictures during video recording; the pictures are set at 13 MP and turn out nice and sharp.One of the features that makes this little powerhouse so easy to use, is the help feature built into the camera itself.  Scroll down the letters of the alphabet and you find help for anything you need in simple easy to follow instructions.I have two tripods that I have not tried out with my new camera, but will do so over the weekend.  With nice weather for the Northwest it should be a good time to go outside and experiment with the many features of this camera.  And while it IS full of features, they are not difficult to find, nor are they difficult to learn how to use.Thus, if you are looking for a pocket sized point and shoot that can take top notch photos and video, this one is for you.  :-)Edited March 3, 2013I have used this camera since last fall, and have only good to say about it.  I am using it with a one legged tripod, but am planning to get a smaller three legged one, like Joby GorillaPod Hybrid Gray.  The pictures are impressive, but even more impressive are the video capabilities of this small camera.  I am still not interested in the 3D, but that is the only feature of this little mega camera that I do not use.  The zoom works best on a tripod or when holding the camera on something sturdy.  The following is a video of my betta fish tank; I held the camera on a shelf, but I was standing on an angle from the camera, so the picture is not as centered as I would like it to be: [...]

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Robert Palmieri
Reviews.Content: Camera picture and video quality is excellent.  I have taken low light video and I am very pleased with quality.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed with Movie Feature
Reviews.Author: J. Nellis "Soccer fan"
Reviews.Content: I just bought this camera because I had a Sony before and liked it. Now with this new one, I am happy with the pic quality but two reasons made me very disappointed: It has a flimsy feel and cheap plastic look, perhaps because it's very light. The second is the movie format AVCHD does not allow me to insert the movie into my "HP Windows live movie maker" so that I can make movies to place in YouTube. The movie displays a "!" and does not play when I click run.  If I don't use movie maker, it plays OK on the computer screen when I use the "Sony Play Memories Home". My old Sony works fine on Windows movie maker. I am not sure if I need to do something or how I can change the format in the camera to enable me to make my movies for YouTube. And I am thinking of returning this camera.  Any opinion out there about the movie format or why it does not play in the Windows movie maker?

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Dan Liddy
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for short trips, and use it in conjunction with a larger digital.  It gives me versatility that larger cameras don't .  great sharpness too, Obviously a high quality lens.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!!! ... loving it each day
Reviews.Author: Ramesh Menon
Reviews.Content: I used to shy away from writing any product review, but the truth is that i relied on many online reviews before i finalized this product. This product is just superb and definitely meets all my expectations.If you are looking for a simple, high-performing point-and-shoot camera then look no further!!!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera.
Reviews.Author: T. Lalonde "crafty gal"
Reviews.Content: Got this camera or our trip to see Pictured Rocks in Munising, Michigan. The panoramic is great and s is the video.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good!
Reviews.Author: Melora Wittig-Estredge
Reviews.Content: I read a lot of reviews, both professional and amateur, before deciding on this camera. I actually think the reviews here on Amazon were the most helpful. I've only had the camera for a few days, but I'm impressed with its simple user  interface and beautiful images. I think I'll be very happy with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Very nice point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Francis Stepanski "F.Stepanski"
Reviews.Content: This is a really nice point and shoot camera, good quality pictures, nice features, clear screen, upgrade on the battery compartment door from an earlier version of same family I had.  Good buy..

Reviews.Title: nice item no regrets of ordering on it
Reviews.Author: arjey capoti
Reviews.Content: item was so nice i love it thanks you amazon this camera thats was i am looking for its suite your budget and your daily needs

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: j "“You can never get a cup of tea large enou...
Reviews.Content: works great.  simply great. Don't know that i'll ever use the 3d feature, but otherwise i really like the options..

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Very quick focus and awesome pictures. Great camera but a little hard to hold on to it is so small.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I picked out this camera for my birthday birthday present earlier this month and I couldn't be any more impressed with it!  I haven't found anything bad to write about it.  And everyone I show it off to is equally impressed, some are ordering the same camera for theirself.I was set on getting a Nikon, but after reading reviews all over the web, I decided on Sony and I'm glad I did my research!

Reviews.Title: Vacation in France
Reviews.Author: Donald Orseck
Reviews.Content: Camera worked great at night in Paris. Scan feature worked well. Flash feature worked well. Zoom was very good. Battery life was not as good as I expected. Overall good bang for the buck.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: KCMOM
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my parents before they went on a trip. They were looking for an easy point and shoot that was compact with a good zoom. Not only did this camera do that, but it did even more! My mom loved taking short video with this camera and also made good use out of the panoramic feature. Their photos turned out great and it was exactly what they were looking for.

Reviews.Title: Everything I was looking for
Reviews.Author: Edward J Bear
Reviews.Content: Takes pictures almost instantly upon pressing the button.  Battery life holds up longer than your average AA battery cameras.  Easy to use and the red eye correction works great.  Overall if you are looking for a good camera to take pictures with at a party or just when hanging out with friends this is a perfect pic.

Reviews.Title: Better than i expected
Reviews.Author: Rick Tindall
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pictures.I was worried about indoor ,low light pics, but it does great. love the zoom and all the other features.

Reviews.Title: OMG !  This is the best camera I have ever owned !! - I have had it for one month now.
Reviews.Author: LivinInVic
Reviews.Content: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX150 18.2 MP Exmor R CMOS Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom and 3.0-inch LCD (Black) (2012 Model)  OMG !  This is the best camera I have ever owned !!  This camera is soooo  goood.  I am really happy with my Sony WX150.  I have had it for a month now and I can't stop smiling.  Pictures are really good (tons of settings to use and many of neat features.)  18.2 MP means there is lot of room for manipulation of your pictures.  I can't stop talking about the 1920x1080 crystal clear video (in stereo also).  When you watch the HD video on a large screen monitor or tv, it looks like you are right there.  It is very compact and packs a lot of punch for your money - the low light video and pictures are amazing.  I am going to treat this WX150 camera like it is having an Uncle that is on "life support".  If you treat your Uncle really well,  take him out only on nice and sunny days, make sure he has ample supply of oxygen bottles to live, keep him clean and well looked after - theory is, that if you keep looking after your Uncle, he will keep looking after you - Your Uncle will be able to keep signing the "cheques" = the WX150 should last a long time with proper care (well, that is what I am hoping).  I am very happy with my purchase and hope the camera can last a long time because I love the performance this camera gives.  Thanks Uncle !Update**** - Have you ever tried to read the small "warning" print on the side of a triple AAA battery ?  I set up my WX150 on a tripod on one side of the house, on the other side of the house I put a AAA battery, lying down on top of a tote-box.  I shown my flourescent desk lamp (about 20 feet away from the battery) onto it.  I set the WX150 to "program" mode and set it to ISO 100, and to flourescent light setting. I zoomed in using the 40x zoom and I used the 2 second delay timer so the camera wouldn't shake and took a pic.  With the picture that was produced, I could read the small print on the side of the AAA battery that says "warning - do not dispose of in garbage"I also tried out the panoramic mode - really cool.  No more snapping individual pictures for the panoramic.  With the WX150, you position the camera where you want to start the panoramic and the push the shutter button once,  then slowly move the camera around to take in your entire view - the camera does everything else.  The result is a high quality panoramic picture. Totally Cool !!

Reviews.Title: Love the size of the camera and gives great pictures even in low light
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth M. Baliem
Reviews.Content: I wanted a camera that would fit in an evening bag, with 14MP or higher, atleast 10x, easy to use and AA batteries. Well, my last desire wasn't met, but I'm very happy because there is an option charger with 2 batteries that can be purchased which means I can keep shooting. It's also easy to switch to panoramic or movies at a touch.

Reviews.Title: Best camera yet!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I bought this amazing camera for my boyfriend for his birthday. He absolutely loves it! All the specs it has is stunning. The 18.2 MP images are flawless. I'm jealous I don't have this camera myself! Ha. I would recommend this camera to anyone who wants a great point shoot digital camera :]

Reviews.Title: Great photos!
Reviews.Author: Licher
Reviews.Content: I tried finding a camera that could take decent night shots.  This one is great and takes even better ones during the day.  It is a very nice point-and-shoot and I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: nice camera and good price
Reviews.Author: Karim
Reviews.Content: I got this Camera today..and must say that it is extremely light, and looks very nice. I bought another model of sony with the same characteristics for §300 in Germany. This one has the same features for much cheaper price. I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Barry
Reviews.Content: I like the low light capability of this camera, very sensitive.  The display is crisp and pleasing.  Aficionado's may say there are better cameras out there, but they would be more expensive.  This one fits my need perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Extremely user-friendly, out of my expectation
Reviews.Author: M.S,
Reviews.Content: This camera is really out of my expectation. It`s very bright and beautiful. When I open it and shoot a picture, the effects is amazing. I know little about camera. But it processes images automatically with high quality. I have to say it`s a right choice.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Marcus B. K. Thompson
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and takes great pictures. Lots of different modes to suit every situation and the price was great.

Reviews.Title: wonderful camera
Reviews.Author: Patricia A. Watrous
Reviews.Content: Just got back from a vacation and this camera takes absolutely wonderful pictures.  Even when the sun is glaring and you can't see the screen, just point and click.  I love this camera.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: Robert Wallace "r wallace"
Reviews.Content: very impressed with video. may replace my other HD sony handycam since this takes better pictures. so far happy with performance. Night shots come out pretty good. much better than my old one. overall very happy.i use it to take family pictures around and on vacation.

Reviews.Title: fix-up photo feature
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "sircyberdawg"
Reviews.Content: This camera has an amazing "Superior Auto" setting. with a yellow i-camera-plus icon, to "shoot sharp image reducing blue and noise automatically." I took a photo, saw it on the display, then in 2-3 seconds, the display changed to the awesome version of the photo. Otherwise, this camera is a little smaller and thicker than a cell phone, fits nicely in the pocket, and takes great photos and high-def video.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: George Efstathiou
Reviews.Content: Excellent little point and shoot camera with great features. I got it for the birth of my son and since then it keeps giving. Perfect if you don't want the fuzz and buzz of SLR cameras but you want the quality of pictures.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-Shot Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Whimsey144 "Whimsey"
Reviews.Content: Love my new camera. Recently went on vacation with my sister, and my pictures are a much better quality than hers. Sharper and the color is better. Even the zoom pics are much more clear than my old camera. I am not a techno geek, this camera is wonderful for my purposes.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: E.D.Z. "Denise"
Reviews.Content: I love that this camera can fit in my pocket so I can have it ready to shoot a picture whenever I see something that I like.  The photo is really clear.  After a little testing, I was able to figure out how to find the best setting.  It took a couple of times to download the software to my computer.  It is made special for those with a Playstation and since I do not have a Playstation I had to figure out how to download just what is needed for my computer.  I recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Easy as Pie
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Moore
Reviews.Content: I am a camera novice and this was so easy to use.  I bought it a few days before my trip to Costa Rica and just hoped for the best.  I was able to take the most amazing pictures of the sea, wildlife and people-the zoom in feature was great.  The camera itself was so simple to use and the anti-shake feature really worked as did the light adjustment and auto flash features.  Another big plus is how compact the camera is, easily fits in a pocket.  I ordered my prints through Shutterfly and they were gorgeous.  The price for this is really a steal!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Buy!
Reviews.Author: KLMartin
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this product! I have had it for a few months now and it had not disappointed me. We travel often so a quality camera is very important to us. The battery lasts a substantial amount of time and the picture quality is excellent. I would highly recommend this camera to anyone. Also as an added bonus the camera charger and my phone charger (a droid) are the same! So I am able to charge my camera in the car if needed.

Reviews.Title: Good little camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Hecetamom
Reviews.Content: I have other cameras including a larger Sony that I really like. I was looking to reduce size and weight so after much research I bought the WX150.In general I am very pleased with it. It is truly light weight, the optical zoom is smooth and works well. It takes good shots in low light situations. I just returned from a trip to Europe and got many good 'cathedral' and 'restaurant meal'. pictures.The only con I have found is the slow recovery time. I rarely need really fast recovery but I need to remember it isn't there, even in continuous shooting mode.I am glad I bought the camera and think I will get a lot of use out of it.

Reviews.Title: Best pocketsize camera with all essential features!!!
Reviews.Author: Mihir_157
Reviews.Content: I would rate this as the best pocket size camera. Excellent features and quality of pictures. Easily downloadable. Would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: great ultra with 10x zoom
Reviews.Author: lunker "lunker"
Reviews.Content: This camera seems to have it all, bought a second one for a relative. I have had cameras in the past that every time I went to use it I went back to the manual, but the interface on this model is relatively simple.  The only downside is the skimpy manual, I found it easier to read some reviews and reference the on-line manual.We have taken a few hundred pics so far and they are great.Fits in your shirt pocket, easy to use, great features, great zoom and great pics.

Reviews.Title: Great quality point and shhot camera
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: We got this camera to take on vacation.  It's easy to use and to figure out the additional features.  Mu husband doesn't like the hassle of figuring out digital devices and even he thought it was great.  The quality of the pictures is great and the 10X optical zoom is fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded expectations
Reviews.Author: audrey flaherty
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace a canon elph 300. I love the sony! It does everything I want and more.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera, takes great pictures
Reviews.Author: RafDiaz
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera, takes great pictures and fits in front pocket, it is very light and durable.  Takes great panoramic pictures, it has an excellent zoom.  One of my best buys from Amazon.  The delivery was quick.

Reviews.Title: Beyond my expecations
Reviews.Author: Rusty Shackleford
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a new camera after realizing my 5+ year old point and shoot was probably on the way out. I was looking to move into the DSLR world, but wasn't sure about carrying all of the extra weight, having to change lenses, etc. I did some searching and stumbled on this Sony for considerably less than any DSLR (and MUCH smaller), and the reviews claimed that it was a fantastic, compact alternative to a DSLR. I was skeptical at first, but after reading positive review after positive review, I took the plunge. I was still skeptical even after I purchased it, thinking no point and shoot could ever meet my expecations. I couldn't be happier with the product, it absolutely exceeded my expectations in every way possible. Right out of the box it takes FANTASTIC photos, and the HD video quality is great. So far I can say I would HIGHLY recommend this product to anyone looking for amazing picture quality for a good price in an easy to carry compact system!!!

Reviews.Title: Very Good Camera!
Reviews.Author: JNT "JNT"
Reviews.Content: Good camera.  Very easy to operate with high quality 18MP pictures. 20X Zoom, focus and low light performance excellent.  $218 at Amazon but $179 at Costco with 8GB chip and nice case.  I usually only buy Canons but I gave this a try on a whim and was not disappointed. Wonderful performance for such a small camera with an 'Easy' setting to spare non-geeks all of the settings heartburn.  Spare batteries may be purchased at Amazon for a minimal amount compared to Sony's $50 price (2 batteries & charger for about $20).  Highly recommend but overpriced at Amazon. I'm usually not a very big fan of Sony cameras but they did a really nice job with this one. Enjoy.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: This camera was easy to use and takes wonderful shots.  Love the panorama feature too!Video performance at 1080 is very impressive as well.Would recomend this camera to anyone!  Good job Sony for providing such a wonderful camera packed with technology that literally fits in a shirt pocket.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot
Reviews.Author: Diane
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! It's takes the best pictures,I love the automatic settings, I was taking pictures of my new grandson and the camera automatically went to infant mode. Great in low light rooms . Im glad I bought this little gem of a camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome little camera
Reviews.Author: W. Living
Reviews.Content: I researched cameras for months before deciding on this one.  I made the right choice!  It is super small and light weight and stores easily in a pocket or purse.  I finally got to test it out at my son's football game today and the results were remarkable.  I got some incredible action shots all the way from the stands using the 10x zoom.  The shots were clear and detailed. I am very pleased with the fun picture effects that you can do, as well.  Buy this camera, you will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: K. Childers
Reviews.Content: It's easy to use yet takes great pictures. It might be hard to take clear pictures when using the zoom because this camera is very light. But I really love it. I love it so much that I got one for my mother-in-law and she loves it too!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: MSO
Reviews.Content: Takes superb quality photos, and has a lot more features than your average camera. The huge optical zoom is impressive, and the build quality is very strong. The easy mode is essential for the older generation (got it for my mom, she's bad with technology) you can set it to Easy mode and they don't have to deal with anything besides zoom, shutter, flash on/off, timed photo.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Mario Jacobo
Reviews.Content: A really good camera, quick shoot, great images, a lot of function, perfect choice. Better option between price and functionality.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: ACipele
Reviews.Content: Excelent photos, fast, light, good battery, great zoom, full hd, very easy to use, connection mini hdmi so you can see photos in your tv, completely satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: This camera has so many interesting features that allow us to take great pictures while on the go. So much easier than carrying a larger camera. The toy mode is probably the favorite right now.

Reviews.Title: Firmware Very Buggy
Reviews.Author: Bodford
Reviews.Content: The camera devloped firmware issues within the first few days of use. Allowing only one picture to be taken each time the camera was turned on. This renders the camera utterly unusable.

Reviews.Title: Terrible flash pictures
Reviews.Author: jcurryfam
Reviews.Content: Am I the only one who is not impressed with the low-light pictures?  The flash on this camera is so bright that the main subject looks pale and washed out.  After reading all the positive reviews, I am very disappointed with this.  Yes, you can manually turn down the flash, but this takes time and the camera seems to re-set itself the next time it is used.  Additionally, I don't feel I should HAVE to always turn down the flash level on an automatic camera.  The daylight pictures are fine; however, I think some of the example pictures were placed on Amazon by Sony employees, because I find them rather incredible, especially the light-house zoom picture.  If anyone has any advice for me, I'd be happy to receive it.  I was very excited about this purchase and this is such a disappointment; considering returning it.Update:  I finally had enough with this camera, so I contacted Sony to see what could be done.  The flash continued to be problematic, causing subjects to be very washed-out and pale looking.  The colors on all pictures are not true, either.  Sony stated it was too late to replace the camera, but stated I could send it in for repair.  I did so, and included examples of pictures I printed out that were taken with the Sony and also comparison pictures from my i-phone (which really should NOT be better pictures).  Sony's findings?  They sent the camera back to me stating "no problems found."  At this point, I wrote a scathing email to Sony and I will never purchase another Sony product.  The camera is listed for sale and I will be purchasing a Canon, which I should have done in the first place.  I don't know what is wrong with all you people that rave about this camera; perhaps you have lower standards than me.  The camera sucks.

Reviews.Title: Flash too strong and ruins every indoor photo
Reviews.Author: Run4Fun
Reviews.Content: Flash makes it unusable when indoors within 20 feet of your subject.I've had this camera almost 1 year and I don't understand so many positive reviews, did these people only use the camera outside? After purchasing and discovering that nothing inside could be closer than 20+ feet without being ridiculously over bright and with shadows behind it I did some more digging and found other posts by people with the same problem. That tells me I'm not alone in this problem! I tried every workaround to dim the flash and spent a lot of time on the phone with Sony only to be told that the extremely bright flash is normal and ok. However, having a shadow behind my subjects and a deer in headlights look at the brightness is not okay for me. I would return this camera, but it was more than 30 days after purchase when I realized the extent of the problem and now I'm stuck with it.The camera does have some great features - video, pix while doing video, outside great pix, continuous pix, lots of scenes, and more already documented. However, the flash ruining all my inside photos makes this camera a clear loser in my book.I'm now shopping for a new camera, but it seems they all pretty much stink in some fashion these days and that's so disappointing! I love my old camera from almost a decade ago, they lasted a long time and didn't have all the firmware and battery problems of cameras these days. I wish I could go back to it!

Reviews.Title: Worst camera ever
Reviews.Author: R. Munavalli "RVM"
Reviews.Content: I own a full-fledged DSLR and I consider myself a semi-professional photographer. Having used many point and shoot cameras as well as DSLRs, I would say this is probably the worst camera on the market. There were several issues right off the bat. The image quality in low light was abysmal. In intelligent mode, the time you need between two shots is almost 2 to 3 seconds. If you are capturing a sports event, forget capturing the shot in time. After two days of use, the image playback option stopped working. It kept displaying the message "Cannot display image". Initially I thought I must have selected a wrong option on the menu. After a day full of shootings pics, when I tried downloading the pictures to my horror there were no pictures in the folder. The playback info was however showing 100+ pictures. I looked under all the folders but couldn't find any. The situation got worse when I couldnt close the lens. I tired switching on and off several times. Even tried removing the battery and putting it back in. After several tries, it finally closed. I would probably rate it in negative scale if I could. DONT BUY !!!!

Reviews.Title: Not recommended
Reviews.Author: D. Porter
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera on the basis of the positive reviews, however I was disappointed by several factors.  It takes decent enough pics but the poor usability and variety of small annoyances make it a poor choice.- Cheap, all plastic construction.  I know it's an inexpensive model, but it feels very flimsy.  Canon and Nikon cameras in this class are much better constructed.- Battery door doesn't fit well.- Small, poor quality buttons/controls.- Zoom control doesn't allow slow or controlled zooming.  Even when barely nudged it jumps to max zoom.- Anti-blur function doesn't work.  No kids or sports mode to catch action shots.- Very long processing time for anything but basic shots.- When selecting a Scene, it doesn't display the actual view so you can't tell how the selected scene affects the shot.- Red-eye functionality is marginal.- No user manual.  There's a quick-start guide but you're on your own to figure everything out.

Reviews.Title: outdated,overcharged
Reviews.Author: Lois Hopkins
Reviews.Content: This camera was outdated, an older model not sold anymore-I was not told this.  Futhermore I was chaged one hundred dollars more than the original asking price for this camera.  I cannot even get accessories for this model. I was very unhappy to discover this after I had opened it and used it.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME Point and Shoot!
Reviews.Author: Bikercarl
Reviews.Content: Aloha From Hawaii!Love this camera!  Bought it to take on a cruise and back up my DSLR.  Absolutely loved it!  Loaded with features and great quality!  Definite bang for the buck!  Buy it if you can find it!!!

Reviews.Title: SONY Cybershot Exmor R CMOS sensor G DSC-WX150
Reviews.Author: travel enthuastist
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera (Sony DSC-WX150) in 2012 for my trip to China and Thailand. That time this camera just came out and not too many reviews. So, I was little hesitant to buy this. But this turned out to be one of my highlight of my trip. I loved this camera. Below is my impressions:Pro:1. It is really compact and fits nicely in my pocket. it is also very lightweight and so easy on my hand.2. it takes great "panoramic" pictures that stitches itself. Just be careful that the subject is not  moving.3. It takes great low light pictures. I mean it is good at low light that it actually can beat $800 Cannon SLR cameras. I went on a trip to Carlsbad Cavern and me and my friend who has a $800 cannon and took pictures. Later on we came to Hotel and compared and the SONY took better and clearer pictures that the Cannon. Then we went for  camping and at dark with some firepit, the SONY pictures came out better than the $800 Cannon!4. It takes great HD Video and the sound is great as well. I recorded a Acrobatic show in Beijing and it was great to watch it later from my SONY camera.5. The SONY battery lasts a long time. Please do not by battery and charger from "Wasabi Power" stuff (see my other review on them). They are crap. Always go with Sony.Cons:I wish the charging of the batter can be done little easier.I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: A. Buchheit
Reviews.Content: I really like me camera. My last camera was a Sony cyber-shot also.  This one is easy to use and takes great pics. I had a problem with the speed of the processing, but I called Sony and they walked me through some system changes and that took care of it. The only thing I'm not sure about is the length of time it holds a charge on the battery. Twice now, it has needed recharged after being stored in the case and not in use. But all in all it is a great camera. I will keep a closer eye on the battery to be sure that the camera has not been left on accidently.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Jasmine Forrest
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical when I received this camera. It was smaller than I expected and when I was getting it set-up, it was running a little slow. However, after it was setup and loaded, it worked very good. I love how clean & clear the pictures are and all the varieties of scene and illustrations I can do. I wouldn't recommend to a perfessional photographer, but if you like to take perfessional looking pictures then this is definitely your camera!

Reviews.Title: Not Built to Last
Reviews.Author: GK28
Reviews.Content: Less than a month after I purchased the Sony DSC-WX 150 Camera, I dropped it, while in a case, from a height of about two feet.  The LCD display cracked.  After contacting Sony, I was told I could return the camera for repairs.  The cost to repair the camera would have been more than 77% of the price I had paid for the new camera.In the past decade, I have owned two Canon Digital Cameras.  They both were well-build and are still working.  I'll be purchasing Canon cameras in the future.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Rex C. Peairs
Reviews.Content: Great camera with loads of features! Excellent zoom capability. I especially like the image stabilization features. Takes clear pictures even on a moving chair lift.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Dennis Kovit
Reviews.Content: Sharp clear pictures; easy to use; would buy again. Sony has always made good products so no surprise with this camera

Reviews.Title: great !
Reviews.Author: barbara mulholland
Reviews.Content: Takes wonderful pictures !! It has lots of options, but in hindsight, it may be more sophisticated than I need.  However, it is a very nice camera.

Reviews.Title: small lightweight
Reviews.Author: Janette Creedon
Reviews.Content: I love how small it is and lightweight. I am still in the process of learning all what it does but that's only because I don't know much about technology

Reviews.Title: Fair Quality
Reviews.Author: AAR
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera after browsing through many reviews online, I was trying to match the quality of my old Pentax camera, the reviews made this phone seem like it took amazing photos, so I was sold, so far the picture quality (at least on auto) are pretty good, they are not as sharp as I would like but it seems to be a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Nice but takes some time to figure out!
Reviews.Author: sveliu
Reviews.Content: So far I like this camera OK, but it is not as easy to figure out how to use it's many options as I'd like it to be.  Even after finding the most detailed instructions online that I could, I wished for even more detailed instructions.  I've spent some hours working on figuring this camera out.  It can just be set on Easy and do everything automatically, and then it seems like any other simple little digital camera, but if you want to try to use all of it's other options, expect to invest some time trying to figure it out.  I think the menus could have been made a little easier.  That is why I can't give it 5 stars.  So far I cannot say that I am wow'd by the pictures I've taken but do not really have complaints on them either. When I took them I hadn't spent those hours working on learning it yet either, so maybe they will get better with some time and effort.

Reviews.Title: Keeping It and Will Try It Some More
Reviews.Author: Heidi Anne Heiner
Reviews.Content: I have only owned Canon digital cameras but since my original point and click Canon (and backup to my more recent one, a Canon PowerShot ELPH 300 HS) is now having problems switching between still and video, I wanted a new backup pocket camera. My biggest complaint with this in comparison to the Canons I have owned is the necessity of charging the battery through the camera. The charger is not external. You can buy one, apparently, but I don't want to buy extra chargers for my camera. I like buying extra batteries to slide into my pocket or purse while traveling--12 hour days during vacation can challenge any camera battery if we are sightseeing enough. The issue of charging through the camera adds some inconvenience and/or cost to keeping those extra batteries handy.Overall, the size of the camera is great, very comparable to my beloved Canons. I like the large screen ratio to camera size but I wonder how it will hold up to abuse in my pocket. I also found menu navigation somewhat easier on this than on my Canon out of the box but the raised dial also worries me about it's durability. I cannot compare the MPs between the two since this Sony is newer and has even more as the cameras do each year. This also has more photo features that I need to experiment more with but overall the pictures it takes are great for a point and shoot. Over time and use I will decide if I prefer Sony cameras over Canon. Under average conditions, the photo quality is pretty equal. I have a feeling it's going to be about the features--Sony has more on this model than I've used in the past but I also wonder if it is overkill. After all, I want point and shoot. And I have Photoshop if I really need my photo doctored. But it is also about the aesthetics--I prefer Canon's body design which is sleeker and slides out of my pocket better and is comprised of less plastic than the Sony, more metal.

Reviews.Title: Finally a great subcompact
Reviews.Author: Evan Jacobs
Reviews.Content: I've had a hard time putting this camera down since I got it.  It's crazy fast (almost no shutter lag) and the image quality is excellent.  This is the subcompact I've been waiting for for years.  The sweep panorama mode works GREAT.  Really, why didn't someone do this before?  You just hold the button and sweep around and, bang, panorama done!  So cool.  OK, navigating the menus is a little hard to get used to.  And there are things the camera doesn't do, like it's not waterproof, no RAW images, etc.  Also, I'm not in love with AVCHD for the movies (it does MP4 too).  But is you just need a very small, very fast point and shoot, this could be just what you've been waiting for.

Reviews.Title: intermittent problems after 8 weeks
Reviews.Author: dissatisfied w/Sony
Reviews.Content: The camera takes excellent photos and videos, but mine started having problems after only eight weeks. When I turn it on, the power light comes on but nothing else works. It happens intermittently, which is no consolation since I want it to work when I need it. The battery is not weak or dead. The first time it happened, the power stayed on for three hours before the battery died.I want to go back to a Canon camera, but I doubt Sony will give me my money back. Plus, I bought an extra battery that will do me no good with a Canon.Don't buy this camera.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot WX150 Review
Reviews.Author: Amazon Reviewer
Reviews.Content: After almost a straight week of researching types of cameras, I decided to purchase the Sony Cybershot WX150. I bought this for it's HD video, to replace my old Nikon L20 camera. Of course I also use this for pictures.Camera Size/Build/Feel- The camera is very thin and small. The downside to this is that you feel you could break the camera just by using it. I also noticed there are some lose parts on the camera. For example the SD card/battery holder. The actual buttons on the camera are good. The are many setting on this camera for you to take the perfect photo(im not really going to go into all the settings).Quality of photos- I've only taking about 5 photos but the are pretty good quality. There is no light in the picture even if you took a picture of something in front of a window.Quality of videos- Like I said this was the main reason I bought this camera. The HD videos are amazing. However if your a Mac user, like me, videos won't import into iPhoto(which is annoying). So if you want to import videos you have to plug your camera into your Mac, go to iMovie and import form there. Also iMovie doesn't support 1080p videos, which is a huge letdown. So you'll have to buy a separate program for Mac, unless you own one, to have true HD videos.Overall- This is a good camera. Lots of settings, battery life is good, videos are great, and photos are great. The only downside is the camera is fragile, and Mac users might not like how iPhoto cant import videos.

Reviews.Title: Good pictures but not well built
Reviews.Author: R. Tanaka
Reviews.Content: Bought this and used it for a few weeks.  The pictures were pretty good for a point-and-shoot.  However, the bottom battery compartment door often opened even when in "lock" position.  The on/off button is also depressed easily such that the camera activates and tries to extend the lens.  The first problem is a major nuisance, the second is the deal-breaker as I know will cause lens problems.  It's on its way back to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great pic & video, the sound is wonderful
Reviews.Author: Michael T. Smith
Reviews.Content: Everything about this camera is great, but trying to get the files off if to my computer is almost impossible!

Reviews.Title: It arrived as promissed
Reviews.Author: Henry
Reviews.Content: The camera works as advertised. The only dissapointment is the way you need to charge the battery. Have not tried the video on the camera yet.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't meet expectations
Reviews.Author: Cathleen Robins
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for 8 months. I replaced my old digital camera because of the lag time between pushing the shutter and getting the shot. This camera wasn't much faster. On top of that the system it uses to transfer the photos to my computer is dificult to use. I still haven't figured out how to do anything with the videos--attach in an email, share on facebook, load into Flickr. As of a month ago (so after 6 months of use) the shutter won't extend when turned on. A google search of this problem shows that it's common in this camera. After a call to Sony where the person on the phone had me reset the settings with no result, I have to PAY to ship it for repair. The repair is free but I will be without a camera for 2-3 weeks and out the cost of shipping and insuring. Then I'll still be stuck with a mediocre camera.

Reviews.Title: Good but not great
Reviews.Author: Helen Woideck
Reviews.Content: We have a camera just like it we thought we had lost. Not lost though. This camera came with a battery door/latch that doesn't work well. The camera was probably banged on that corner. It will close but not easily , some times taking minutes to get the catch to close properly.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: books4you
Reviews.Content: I like this camera very much. I do wish the shutter speed was faster though with no delay at all. It is very hard to find a camera that has very little shutter speed or none at all.

Reviews.Title: mine died after 2 months
Reviews.Author: Kevin L. Williams "Kevin"
Reviews.Content: thought it might just be the charger but bought a new charger and new battery and its still dead as door nail.  Not sure what to do with it.  seems like if it had energy the rest of it would work.  if anybody knows please let me know.  thanks.

Reviews.Title: Really good
Reviews.Author: BGirl
Reviews.Content: I Absolutely love this camera especially panorama mode. Video is nice but take a lot of space of my memory.

Reviews.Title: Fun, But...
Reviews.Author: kcharn
Reviews.Content: I was a college student taking a non-major course in an Intro to Photography when I purchased this. We're required to have an exposure log with every assignment we turn in (included ISO & Shutter Speed columns) ---- with that being said, this camera has some white balancing options, which you can just visually see if it's over exposed or not through the display screen BUT there aren't physical ISO or shutter speed numbers or meters. This camera is good, just for fun picture-taking. They have neat little features to make your photos look "cool" but that's not what I needed it for. I should have looked more into it before buying but it is a good camera. I just ended up giving it to my parents because it's simple and the pictures turn out pretty great. The one thing I will vouch for is how great this camera is in low lighting. I've used many point & shoots and their images were usually too grainy or just.. plain dark in low light or the high ISO settings were just so noisy but this camera works really well. Images are crisp and clean. A good camera overall.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: MMR
Reviews.Content: very good but not perfect you can found another camera better for this price there is problem in the battery cover but i like it the photos is very good

Reviews.Title: Very Happy with the product
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: Takes excellent pictures at varying distances and lighting conditions.  I bought this to improve camera motion and quality over my 2 year old Fujitsu and it delivered on that.  Battery life far exceeded my expectations as I recently took a 3 week vacation and several hundred pictures and did not have to use my reserve battery.  The one issue that I do have with the camera, and this is picky, is that low light photography color is pretty poor.  I suspect this is true of all automatic cameras and if I had the time or energy to actually read the book and set up the camera for the "one" photo, it could be improved. In a perfect world, a low light button would do all that for me, as I am not going through the t(o numerous to mention), menus to find the longer expouser settings.

Reviews.Title: Too slippery, very poor manual, VERY annoying software
Reviews.Author: Kevin Pezzi, MD
Reviews.Content: I'll be brief:(1) No camera this small should be this slippery; it is simply too easy to drop.(2) The lanyard is missing a slider to snug it up around the wrist.(3) Plugging its USB cable into a computer unleashes a torrent of Sony windows popping up, all but one of which are irrelevant to downloading photos the most direct way possible, which is NOT through Sony's PlayMemories Home software.(4) The DSC-WX150 manual (printed and in-camera) is incomplete and utterly exasperating.(5) There's no manual focus, and the auto-focus is pathetic on close (< 1 foot) objects.

Reviews.Title: la mejor camara del mundo
Reviews.Author: Maria Ynes
Reviews.Content: me encanta mi nueva camara es la mejor. toma fotos buenisimas. esta nueva de paquete y es tal como la pedi. superrrrrrr feliz con ella.

Reviews.Title: Excellent For Your Pocket or Purse
Reviews.Author: Max Poppers
Reviews.Content: Very compact and well designed.Easy to use.10 times zoom is a very good feature.Good refresh rate in low light conditions.Very good flash. Canon makes good stuff, I am a professional photographer for over 30 years, with a full range of Canon pro equipment. I never have bought a point and shoot until now.With 18 megapixels, it provides excellent resolution for printed photos.I love not schlepping my pro gear around if it isn't required.I enjoy this camera and believe you will too.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Ramphy 90
Reviews.Content: This a Mega Camera, with xmor R take a beautiful photos in day and the nigth. 18mp is better camera.

Reviews.Title: YOU CAN GET THIS SAME CAMERA CHEAPER AT THE ACTUAL SONY WEBSITE FOR $199.
Reviews.Author: ICY
Reviews.Content: YOU CAN GET THIS SAME CAMERA IN THE SONY WEBSITE CHEAPER FOR $199… NOT SURE WHAT COLORS THOUGH. (JUST SAYING) ;)

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Steven M. Behrmann
Reviews.Content: good camera for the price. I purchased the cmaera carrying case also on Amazon at the same time. They amke a perfect pair.

Reviews.Title: Amazingly good pictures from such a tiny camera.
Reviews.Author: Marion S. Becker
Reviews.Content: Haven't yet tried it on manual settings. Fairly easy to shoot, view and transfer to computer. Battery lasts a long time.

Reviews.Title: Great in video
Reviews.Author: azd seb
Reviews.Content: It is my first camera and I like it. It make good video and good pictures. Easy to make in use.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Step forth
Reviews.Content: Just got back from vacation.  Never missed a shoot.  Very good camera.Would highly recommend!  This camera is small and very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Tom Timberlake
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my wife for Christmas so she could carry it in her purse and take pictures of the new grandson (and I wouldn't have to take my big camera everywhere we went.). I haven't taken a picture since. this is a great little camera and does more things than my big one. Video works great. Panaramic feature is wonderful. Could't be more pleased.

Reviews.Title: Good little camera
Reviews.Author: Walter "Walter"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter as a replacement for an older Sony that died.  It is very fast for a pocket camera, and takes good  video, even in low light.

Reviews.Title: Nothing special
Reviews.Author: Lucky19942001 "mmanson13"
Reviews.Content: Bought this when our son broke our camera and needed one ASAP and did not have really anytime to research a camera. It is ok and great for anyone that wants a camera to do everything for them. Wish some features worked more like red eye but only happens every so often and then I am left with a image with red eye that I have to delete guess that's the up side to digital. Good camera but nothing special

Reviews.Title: It's everything it claims to be...and more.
Reviews.Author: Richard V. Taylor "williwaw"
Reviews.Content: First of all I say "Ditto" to everything that 'Fair Minded Guy' said in his review + updates :[...]I purchased one for my other half as a Christmas gift and one for me because I liked what was written about it and needed an updated 'point'n'shoot'. I also got my other half the Ikelite underwater case for the camera. Coincidentally, she got me the same camera as a Christmas gift...so our minds were thinking alike.I got the Sandisk Extreme 45MB/s 32GB chips and also the Wasabi extra batteries and charger for both - and both work flawlessly.Unlike the drawback that 'Fair Minded Guy' had with the camera, e.g. that it doesn't shoot in RAW format. I feel I would go to our stable of DSLR's to get that shot in RAW. However, the only drawback for me that I would like to see in this camera would be for it to have a built-in interval timer. That's it. Now go get ya one before they're all sold out.

Reviews.Title: Videos don't download to Mac
Reviews.Author: John L.
Reviews.Content: I ordered the camera in time for an international trip and am suddenly aware that it will not download videos to my Mac or iPad without purchase of a converter program and a good deal of technical savvy that I don't have. Shouldn't the product information make clear that you need to purchase a video converter if you are using a Mac?

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: qt
Reviews.Content: Love all the different features, takes quick and sharp pictures and is great with reducing bluriness when kids are moving quickly.

Reviews.Title: Good pictures
Reviews.Author: Carole S. McNamee
Reviews.Content: I haven't used it very much yet.  It would have been helpful to have more written instructions.  I find the in-camera help to be somewhat distracting.  It does a nice job of taking basic pictures and is lightweight.

Reviews.Title: So nice
Reviews.Author: Kym Hammershmid
Reviews.Content: a little getting used to but I really like this one. I have a really nice cannon but this is just fun to play around with. panarama option is way fun!!

Reviews.Title: Nice, compact camera!
Reviews.Author: HydrangeaDahlia
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband who does not carry a large camera.  Great quality picture and so compact!  We both like it!

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: ke "kimmishere2"
Reviews.Content: This camera is all I expected it to be.  I had the same camera for years and this was an upgrade for me, and the photos are excellent! It's easier to use than I thought it would be, too.

Reviews.Title: The Camera Everybody Else Wishes They Had
Reviews.Author: estates
Reviews.Content: I am absoutely in love with this camera. So much so that I just bought a second one in less than 6 months (as I stupidly lost the one I purchased this summer).This review will be on the camera I actually used for several months:I spent hours comparing reviews, features, and prices before I finally went with the cyber-shot dsc-wx150, even though it had been the favorite to week since early on in the race.At the top of my list was for high quality photos in different types of lighting (especially in dark lighting), and less blurry-ness and noise. I also wanted something small and portable, with decent zoom, video recording with sound, and fairly easy to use. Essentially, I was looking for a nice, compact point and shoot. Which the Sony CyberShot DSC-WX150, I got that and so much more.Some of the "so much more":-Taking photos while recording a video-Different photo effects, my favorite being all in black in white except shades of red. There are also settings to make it look like a painting, a watercolor, etc.-Panorama option-Saving photos on camera by date groupings, and thus also being able to delete by date.-Anti-blur and motion detection. Easy to take a shot while walking that wont come out blurry, and is great at catching movement, so you can catch that instant when they kick the ball, jump in the air, or anything and everything else.-Superior Auto: automatically detects the best scene setting, and takes 6 shots to combine into one final photo, on top of the regular features of the camera including anti-blur and motion detection, and the clarity of zoomed in photos. Upside: I hardly ever even think about checking photos after I take them to ensure they weren't blurry or hard to see (in the dark, I do check them more frequently)as I had to do constantly with my old camera; I know that they're going to be high quality because you get nothing less witih this camera. Downside: Slower shutter speed as there is a long processing time for each photo.The "downsides"--more accurately, minor grievances I sometimes note, but by no means deterrents to getting this camera.-Zoom speed/button. It could have been just on mine, but it would have a delay like it wasn't working, and then go in too much if it did work.-I have had mixed success taking photos of night scenes that have a lot of light in them, like a bridge lit up with streetposts or an illuminated fountain. This is more likely because of me, than the camera.All in all, you can't go wrong with this camera, except maybe more skilled photographers and enthusiasts who prefer DSLR's. Though for being a point-and-shoot, I'm sure it would be more than satisfactory. Absolutely worth the price. I have not regretted purchasing this camera for a second.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Mama to Max
Reviews.Content: So many great features in one little camera!  I am extremely happy with my purchase.  I bought this after the lens on my Cannon Elph stopped retracting, and the difference between cameras is astounding.  I had many blurry pics and slow shutter speed w/ my Elph, and I have neither issue with my new Cyber-shot.

Reviews.Title: Sony DSC-WX150 review
Reviews.Author: Ferd
Reviews.Content: So far so good. I took it to Maui in early October and the photos are here:[...]This replaces a Canon ELPH that I dropped and had a lense error after that. For the money I am very happy and satisfied so far. This was an upgrade for the 10X optic zoom, 18 MP res, and HD video for a little more money than my Canon. Isn't technology great?

Reviews.Title: So Far so Good
Reviews.Author: carolyn
Reviews.Content: I got this to replace a Sony cyber shot DCS-WX1. While I liked a few of the features on the old model better like the placement of the zoom buttons and picture display button - this is a great little camera. The screen is bigger than the one I had and in time I know I will come to love this camera. The one I had was great at low light situations and when I showed my pictures people always thought I was using my more expensive DSLR. This is great for someone who doesn't want manual functions and for those quick picture situations. This is the camera to leave in your purse or pocket. I was happy with my old camera that got damaged (my own doing)but I know this one will be just as good and hopefully better with the bigger zoom. Sony does not disappoint.

Reviews.Title: Sony
Reviews.Author: Carlos
Reviews.Content: I love Sony products and my camera is the best for the money. If you need a good camera go for it...

Reviews.Title: Can't Upload Video to my Mac Computer
Reviews.Author: Revcat
Reviews.Content: I used this camera last summer while visiting the grandkids. Took some video of their birthday, but when I got home the pictures I took uploaded fine, but the video did not transfer to my Mac. I am not a computer geek so if there is a workaround for this, I have no idea what it is.I have found, via experience, that non-Apple devices do not always work with the Mac. Bummer! As far as ease of use and quality of photos, I have no problem with the camera, but the ONLY reason I bought it was to take video. My (several years) old Cannon digital took great photos but lousy video, however I was able to load my Cannon videos into my computer, whereas my new camera, as stated previously, is not compatible.Later on I took video using my iPad and guess that's what I will do from now on, but I can't lug an iPad around in my pocket :) :) :) And I'm too cheap to get an iPhone which is why I still need a nice camera.If anyone has a workaround for my problem, please enlighten me and I shall be most grateful :)

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot
Reviews.Author: Tweetu
Reviews.Content: Handy and wonderful cam. Had a very nice experience. Loving it. It is very flexible and gives a clear image. Easy to carry.

Reviews.Title: DSC-WX150
Reviews.Author: David Rowell "Kenfolk"
Reviews.Content: I've been using this camera for a little over a month now and love it! I bought it to take it to EAA Airventure to take pictures of the airshow and all the planes and the pictures came out fabulous. There was no blurring on moving planes and the detail was fantastic. All the different options you have on this camera are also really great, I'm partial to partial colour myself (ha). I'm not a huge fan of the panorama, but it does take stellar video. The only problems I had with it was picture quality degrades into digital zoom but that is expected, and the picture isn't crystal clear when viewed at the maximum 18.2MP resolution. When scaled down (I looked at them on my 1920x1080 monitor) they looked fantastic. I would definitely recommend this camera!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed in photo quality
Reviews.Author: Dizzer7 "dizzer7"
Reviews.Content: Ended up returning this camera. I wanted to like it. I got it at a crazy good price pre-holidays, but after taking different test pictures I just couldn't justify keeping it and ended up going with a Nikon point and shoot instead. It has a wonderful feature set, but at the end of the day, what really counts is how you photos look and when they are pixelated and not crisp, it's just not worth it. Sorry.

Reviews.Title: Cheap build quality
Reviews.Author: Keith
Reviews.Content: So it's a Sony and a cheap model at that.I anticipated this model to be made from machine aluminum as several of my older Sony's have been. I was unhappy to open the box and discover a light weight item that feels cheap. Performance is satisfactory for a camera of this price set. I am unhappy with the zoom quality and the overall operation.I bought this as a gift for my 50-60 y/o mother. She wanted small camera that turned on quickly. This fit the bill.For me, I would purchase a higher quality point and shoot, if I were in this market again.

Reviews.Title: jorge silva
Reviews.Author: jorge silva
Reviews.Content: muy buena toma las fotos calidad y en distintos estilos tiene una gran variedad de funciones el flas es muy bueno

Reviews.Title: Disappointed with pictures
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: I got this camera last week after the lens on my Canon point and shoot broke. The features are great, it's a nice camera, but I was disappointed with the picture quality. The pictures had this weird oil painting quality to them, they're not as clear as I expected, the lines aren't sharp, the details are blurry. I will be returning this camera and getting another Canon.

Reviews.Title: Does its job and then some.
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for an awesome point and shoot camera, then you are looking in the right place! This camera not only takes great photos, but it also comes with a lot of features and goodies. Thank you Sony!

Reviews.Title: Too complicated camera that makes bad shots
Reviews.Author: andreikh
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera as a replacement for DSC-W100 that began to develop problems. First we were exited that the DSC-WX150 is very small, shots HD video and supposedly is very capable. However, after a month or so casual use we can't get good pictures out of it.Colors look unnatural without flash if shooting indoors. With the flash colors are better at a distance 6-12 or so feet; however,  at 2-4 feet flash just bleaches everything. On the other hand, the flash is not powerful enough for large distances like 15-20 feet.  We tried so-called "easy mode" and other modes which are plenty of and none works well for us. Many images are not in focus if shots are made without flash. The wheel that changes shooting modes could easily be accidentally moved to another position. The lens optics is probably of the low quality: in many pictures, faces are elongated  of other wise distorted. Movies are great but the Win XP transfer wizard doesn't recognize them. On the other hand, some service files and directories that are in the camera's memory always pops up during the transfer.Our old Sony DSC-W100 had none of these problems. It has Zeiss lens, made shots with great color balance and was easy to use.We are going to return this camera and get something simplier and more user-friendly.

Reviews.Title: I'm not exactly a camera expert...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: but I do like this camera. It's simple to use, and the pictures don't come out excessively blurry. In fact, I've gotten great pictures at dances (I'm a volunteer for a youth group...and we do a LOT of dances). I don't have a lot to say about cameras, but I do like this one.

Reviews.Title: No Chinese language menu
Reviews.Author: CS Doctor "csdoctor"
Reviews.Content: Can not believe that in the modern day, a menu is still not multi-national. It is cheap to design the menu in several popular lanaguage (e.g. English, French, German, Chinese ...). This is a gift to my Chinese friend, yet it is pain in the ass to find out that there is no menu in Chinese language. Can not use, can not return. It is a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: The quality of Sony has decreased!!!
Reviews.Author: Terilyn Nihipali
Reviews.Content: I must say, I've had a Sony camera before and would have never thought I would be displeased with this new purchase.  As always, Sony cameras take wonderful pictures, however, my gripe with this product lies in the body itself.  It looks and feels like a little toy.  I take extra precaution to make sure I do not drop this camera, fearing it will break open easily.Other than that, it is a decent camera and takes wonderful shots.

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: Sly Hoax "y2kh8r"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to upgrade from an $80 camera. The pictures were not any better. They were sometimes worse. Maybe I wasn't using the camera right, but it's a point n shoot, and that's what I did. The one thing that this camera does have going for it is that it starts up and shuts down incredibly quickly.

Reviews.Title: A bit frustrating
Reviews.Author: The Qua "Space Octopus"
Reviews.Content: All in all, this camera is great, it takes amazingly good photographs etc. The thing I'm pissed about is that it can't even have the basic settings for exposure, which I need to make HDR photos. I mean how hard is it to include such a SIMPLE option?Other than that, this camera has quite a lot of settings, takes great photos and video. I haven't had a chance to view the 3D photos/video, but I can't wait to.

Reviews.Title: Confused & Couldn't judge
Reviews.Author: Shivaji
Reviews.Content: First of all, I am still confused whether or not this camera meet my expectations.  It had all the necessary features and additional features like 3D (photo & video), Panaromic photo, etc...  However, the quality of picture is not so good.  I could see lot of noise in the pictures that were taken indoors.  I have owned about 4 Sony Point & Shoot Cameras in the past 8 years but none of them match the picture quality of my first ever Sony camera thats's made in Japan (rest all made in China). Still thinking whether to retain this camera or to return it!

Reviews.Title: Good camera with some neat slr features
Reviews.Author: Balakumar
Reviews.Content: The camera is great. The image stability feature is pretty important when u want to avoid shaky blurry photos. It has some cool slr features. I never wanted a complicated camera which only pros can handle. It's easy to use and gets de job done very well.

Reviews.Title: SLOW, SLOW, SLOW
Reviews.Author: somi
Reviews.Content: This camera is terrible. I can't believe it got the good reviews it did. Have those people never used a digital camera before? It takes 30+ seconds to ' process'  each picture. That means you can't shoot another one until it's ready. It's like going backwards in technology. The I have missed so many great shots it's painful! I constantly feel like smashing it and likely will at some point.  Picture quality is not particularily exciting. Overall a HUGE dissapointment and a big waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Beyond amazing pictures!
Reviews.Author: thevoices824
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for 2 and a half weeks. I was on the fence about it due to mixed reviews. I have mainly used it for everyday pics of my cats and friends. I took it to the zoo this past Sunday and I got such amazing pictures. The color is so sharp and the zoom is beyond insane. Even when it goes into the digital zoom, most pictures on cameras would blur, mine were totally clear.It also takes pictures very fast. My old camera you had to hold the button down and it took a couple seconds to take it. This one snaps it in a second. Works well when people are in front of you and you need a quick picture.I also love the big LCD screen, such a must for me.A couple negatives - when I took pictures of a gorilla inside the zoo, the lighting was VERY dark. Even to the eye it was hard to see the features, just a black shape. I got a few pictures on my camera but then it started shutting off when I kept trying. It would turn back on when I'd face it away from that area but when I put it back it turned off again and wouldn't turn on until I moved away. I don't know if it was because it was so dark that it couldn't find anything to take a picture of? That was the only time that has happened so I'm thinking it had to be something like that. There were other dark areas, not as dark as that one and the camera was fine.Also my battery went dead after about 5 hours. Granted, I was using it almost constantly and I kept it on superior auto where it chooses which scene is best for that picture. So I don't know if that uses up more battery life? Plus it was kept on constantly, though after a couple minutes of no use it will shut itself off, so there was a lot of turning on and off.One other thing, when I transferred my pictures to my computer a few of the ones that were taken in darker lighting barely show up. On the camera itself they are clear but on the computer it's just dark shapes. It's only a few and I took over 200 pictures, but I was a little disappointed. It could be the memory card and not the camera though. I think that's more likely.I know it seems I have more negative than good things to say, but  I must stress strongly this is the best camera I've owned. My pictures are so amazing and I've had people online comment on how good they are. If it weren't for the fact that it is a lithium battery which costs more than rechargeable double A which is what my past cameras have taken, I wouldn't have even had a problem with it. I will definitely be buying another battery for it when I can afford it and have no thoughts on returning it. I am in love with this camera and can't say enough how awesome the pictures are. My friends were even saying the camera is pretty cheap for all it does.I'm not an expert camera user, just for everyday, concert, and outings such as the zoo and small trips. But this camera is beyond the best for it's price range.

Reviews.Title: really good value!
Reviews.Author: Ward J. Lamb
Reviews.Content: This little camera is easy to use and offers good quality shots.It has functions to allow creative decisions that even enhance or alter the mood or atmoshere of a shot.The video zoom is dependable and stays focused in many different situationsThe HD is striking,and the video is amazing .I enjoy watching the hd family shootings on my flat screen.The size of the camera is compact,and is good even in my rather big hands.You can shoot a still image while in video mode,and the camera works excellent in low light.Portability makes this camera a great choice for high quality when on the move.The wait period on successive shots is fast and the lens is super.I really like this camera.It is versatile,offers an easy operation with features that make lquality picture taking easier.I'm getting another for a family member.I feel the charger should be a separate battery unit-but the chord charger it comes with is adequate.I have used canons ,loved my old sd1000,and current s100,but this one is cheaper and pretty awesome. This is a point and shoot camera thus do not expect the quality of higher end cameras-but for general use it's damned good.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed by the build quality of this camera
Reviews.Author: Alban A. Mason
Reviews.Content: The specs on this camers are awesome and it works great.  However, it is made of plastic.  I don't why Sony would make a camera body out of platic.  Would have expected that from a lesser known manufacturer.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber Shot DSC-WX150 18.2 MP
Reviews.Author: MAP
Reviews.Content: After just a few months using it, the LCD displayed a permanent white line in the bottom half of the screen. Annoying but did not affect the quality of the pictures. Am sure this is a factory defect as the camera has never been dropped, gotten wet, nor exposed to temperature extremes. I have other digital cameras, but this is the first time I am experiencing this.

Reviews.Title: Would give it a higher rating if it came with a memory card!
Reviews.Author: Margaret Gould
Reviews.Content: I was very surprised to find that this camera did not come with a memory stick!  How cheap of Sony!  I do expect it to perform as my other Sonys, but I just received it.  It is the small things that eventually lose customers.

Reviews.Title: Broken LCD
Reviews.Author: Biggersmaller
Reviews.Content: Bought the Sony WX150 less that 90 days ago for ~$250 in June for the wife's birthday and our Euro vacation. Worked like a dream for still/video during the vacation in July, worked great taking pics of the baby at the zoo outdoors in June, and recently took great pics of a bachelor party/bachelorette party both indoors in August.Even worked great yesterday evening taking pics at a party. HOWEVER, the LCD has randomly become irrevocably distorted today in the middle of taking pictures at the Minnesota State Fair. Essentially, the LCD has gone to looking 1/4 clear, 1/4 looking clear with vertical lines, and 1/2 all white. Reset the thing multiple times to no avail. I hate to give it one star, but what choice do I have? Exchanging it this week.Cannot recommend.

Reviews.Title: what happened?
Reviews.Author: sapphire
Reviews.Content: I was all ready to order this camera last night when the price suddenly went up $60.00!! Looking elsewhere for this camera b/c I want it in blue.

Reviews.Title: WONDERFUL CAMERA,
Reviews.Author: Mary A. Mount
Reviews.Content: I had a couple of replys about the size of the screen.Thanks to other people, letting me know the company gives you thethe total inches of the camera as three inches, my mistakeI thought the screen was going to be three inches.This camera is a great little camera.

Reviews.Title: WELL DUH!
Reviews.Author: Good shoe - bad shoe size
Reviews.Content: I don't know why I am writing a review for this product. Of course it's an above average product. It's great quality. Great features etc.
