Reviews.Title: It is difficult to shoot my own music playing
Reviews.Author: takafumi eura
Reviews.Content: To shoot my own music playing, it's difficult to start video recording because the video start switch is located screen side which is behind when I do that. I had to look for the switch blindly. My previous Cyber-shot had the switch at the top as consistent as still photo shutter. I will look for another one like that.

Reviews.Title: good but incomplete
Reviews.Author: who knows
Reviews.Content: This is a good point and shoot camera but why is no memeory included with the camera. Can not be used without it so it is an incomplete package.

Reviews.Title: Ruined my Xmas!
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: Received it b4 Xmas. Brought it to Disneyland on Xmas. Code "E:62:10" began to keep flashing on the screen. Didn't know what it was until got home and googled online, got so pissed bc it says "A production issue, needs to be fixed by SONY". WHAT THE ***? I can't belive it!!!Called amazon, was told it's not a surprise. They got a lot of complaints like this! Returned, and decide not to buy things like cameras on here any more. Frustrating, my Xmas... sigh.

Reviews.Title: Sony 150
Reviews.Author: BG
Reviews.Content: Bought at Costco yesterday.  Taking back tomorrow.  No problem with photo quality.  Excellent price point.  BUT...very flimsy. Micro sized buttons impossible to use.  And menu navigation absolutely impossible and unacceptable,  I'm a college grad, far from an idiot, but try as I might could not figure myriad of cryptic menu routes and detours.  There MUST be an easier to use camera that takes decent pix somewhere out there

Reviews.Title: Shipping from Datavision Not a Confidence Builder
Reviews.Author: Angela C.
Reviews.Content: I received the sony cyber shot wx150 from Datavision. It was in a sony box, placed in a larger box, with no packaging materials. This is not a confidence builder for a business to ship a camera in a larger bare box, so that it can be knocked about the whole delivery trail. I haven't tried the camera yet. I was thinking of returning it, and ordering it from a business that is more conscientious in their hand-off.

Reviews.Title: Not for this price and quality. canon elph 300 far better
Reviews.Author: Marka
Reviews.Content: I have both sony wx150 and canon elph 300( ixus 220 )and compare the image quality and body quality, saw that canon is far better than this new sony. i buy sony wx150 just for i wondered about the swip panaroma and the 10x zoom but i saw the panaroma it's just for fun and you can do it with any software better than this. the zoom it's really good but not very useable for me. night mode shot with canon is better than sony because of 2.7 aperture vs 3.3 in sony. and the body quality is poor in sony vs canon metal body and the feeling when you take in your hand.

Reviews.Title: Pictures too large to upload
Reviews.Author: S&S Auto
Reviews.Content: I don't understand why the pictures have to be so large to upload, e-mail, post a picture etc. I do alot of online sales, so now I have to shrink the photos 'one by one' to be able to use them. Might as well be Pony Express. Could not find ANY settings in the camera guide or online to fix this. I wish I would have never bought it, I would never think that Sony would have it set up like that. My 8 year old Cybershot works like it should.

Reviews.Title: WORST CAMERA EVER _ DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: R. Day
Reviews.Content: This is the WORST camera I have ever owned!!! DO NOT BUY IT.  In 30 days I've had to call customer service three times.  It does not work.  It is a piece of junk.  I do not understand all the positive reviews.  I am returning it. Going back to panasonic.  Very sorry I wasted money on this. IT DOES NOT WORK.  Don't count on it to function when you need it.  Customer service at sony is not very helpful either.

Reviews.Title: No memory card
Reviews.Author: W R French
Reviews.Content: Received this camera only to find that the memory card is "sold separately".  Really?  A camera should come out of the box ready to point and shoot.  Maybe Sony should try selling cars with "wheels sold separately".  Sent this back as a matter of principle.

Reviews.Title: do not buy
Reviews.Author: denny
Reviews.Content: If I could post this review without selecting any stars i would.  Do not buy any Sony Cybershot camera.  They  are completely worthless.  I have foolishly purchased 2 over the last year and have not yet been able to download a picture.  They are completely worthless.
